216501.name: Farewell, George Bertram
216501.description:
From publisher blurb:

George Bertram, the characters’ beloved boss is retiring. And he wants them to dig up dirt and help him give the finger to Johnathan Silas, the rival who has stymied his corporate advancement every step of his career.

A Murders & Acquisitions adventure for 1st level characters.

216502.name: Love & Hate
216502.description:
From publisher blurb:

The characters are enlisted by a mysterious benefactor to help take down the CEO and board members at Preston-Steele. Their first target is David Stritch, who is planning something traitorous.

A Murders & Acquisitions adventure for 1st level characters.

This is the first adventure of four in the Deep in the Red Adventure Series.

216503.name: Breaking & Entering
216503.description:
From publisher blurb:

The characters are enlisted by a mysterious benefactor to investigate CFO Bethany Horvath. Where has she been sinking the company’s money?

A Murders & Acquisitions adventure for 2nd level characters.

This is the second adventure of four in the Deep in the Red Adventure Series.

216504.name: Day & Night
216504.description:
From publisher blurb:

The characters are enlisted by a mysterious benefactor to investigate the disappearance of several interns. Where did they go? Who is responsible?

A Murders & Acquisitions adventure for 3rd level characters.

This is the third adventure of four in the Deep in the Red Adventure Series.

216505.name: Mergers & Executions
216505.description:
From publisher blurb:

The characters continue their quest to take down the board members by taking out CEO Gerald Huff. At the same time, their benefactor enacts the final part of her plan.

A Murders & Acquisitions adventure for 4th level characters.

This is the final adventure of four in the Deep in the Red Adventure Series.

216506.description:
From publisher blurb:

The characters learn of a threat looming over them and their company and have to make a choice about how they’re going to handle that threat. Who is the Master of Copper?

A Murders & Acquisitions adventure with magic and monsters for 3rd level characters.

216507.name: Leave of Absence
216507.description:
From publisher blurb:

Strange things are afoot at Bidwell & Thorne. People are acting strangely. Others are disappearing. Will the characters succumb?

A Murders & Acquisitions adventure with future tech and cosmic horror for 2nd level characters.

216508.name: Making the Battlefield Work to Your Advantage
216508.description:
From publisher blurb:

The Pathfinder Roleplaying Game does a great job at breaking down the various types of terrain and the rules for working through it. Unfortunately it sometimes leaves out the all important “What can my characters do to optimize these rules?” part. Hopefully this Sidebar will take care of that.

216509.name: Duck ★ March
216509.description:
Parent and child of Kalgamo is a good friend.
Always walking together, it is the same when crossing the road.
If, If you wait too long and the stray,
ducklings can not cross the road.
Then, there are a lot of danger on the road ... be careful!

216510.name: Snowball Zombies
216510.description:
User summary
Roll the snowball roll over the zombies!
To the peaceful village shut in by the snow, the zombies suddenly come and approach!
The villagers used the last hope "Snowball" to challenge the zombies ...!

雪玉ゾンビ (Yukidama Zombie) in English means 'Snowball zombies'. This is a strategic action game using tilted boards. As a villager, the player rolls snowballs (balls) from the top of the hill and repels the zombies that are approaching. As a player's action, you can roll snowballs or drive piles into the board. The player who beat the most zombies and became the hero of the village is the winner!

Publisher's summary
雪玉ゾンビは、傾いたボードを使った戦略的アクションゲームです。
プレイヤーは村人として、丘の上から雪玉（ボール）を転がして迫りくるゾンビを撃退します。
プレイヤーのアクションとして、雪玉を転がしたり盤面に杭を打ったりすることができます。一番ゾンビを倒して村の英雄となったプレイヤーが勝者です！

216511.name: Nutaberr
216511.description:
From publisher blurb:

The Nutaberr are a rare and reclusive species. Roughly the same size as halflings, they live in treetop villages built in secluded woods far from the reach of other races. Protective of their homes, Nutaberrs will typically try to stay out of sight when confronted with intruders. Monitoring them from the branches above, they’ll attack if they perceive anything even resembling a threat to themselves or their forests.

Their isolationist lifestyle is, sadly, a learned one. Once a friendly people, the other races soured them on outside contact with a string of broken promises and betrayals. Many times in the past the Nutaberrs have seen their forests destroyed to serve the whims of others. As a result, most Nutaberrs have eschewed Common and speak only their own language. This makes communication difficult even when they are inclined to speak with interlopers.

216512.name: Hiragana Sentence
216512.description:
Hiragana Sentence is a mix of boggle and bingo. Each round a new theme will be drawn and hiragana characters drawn bingo style. Players will fill their 5x5 sheet with the characters in any way they want, after all of them have being filled up players try to form a word based on the theme. Players vote for the best word of the round and a new round is played.

Description from the publisher:

It is a communication game to make sentences that fit the theme by connecting hiragana well. She turns over the cards with hiragana written and fills the letters in the favorite squares of the sheet in that order. When everyone can write, last letters are connected by a line and announced.

216513.name: Developers VS Managers: The Boardgame
216513.description:
WORLD'S FIRST BOARD GAME FOR DEVELOPERS AND MANAGERS

STORYLINE
You are working for one of the most promising tech startups in Silicon Valley. Everybody expects the release of v2.0 of your product. This could be a huge leap for the whole company, or it might destroy it if the deadline is not met. The CEO has offered $100 000 to the team that contributes most for the new release. This will be either the developers or the PM team claiming the credit.Who will be the hero of the day? And which team will be remembered by history? It’s all up to you and your friends to decide!

PURPOSE
Developers vs Managers is an entertaining / educational board game. The game is designed for IT Specialists by IT Specialists. The purpose of the game is to improve the soft skills of everybody involved. Developers vs Managers is ideal for play when you are on a team building event, having fun in the office or just breaking the ice with new people.

How to play:
First - gather 5 to 10 friends or colleagues
Draw your role and keep it secret until the end of the game!
Are you a developer or a manager?
The others will judge you by your actions, not just by what you are saying!
Pick-cards
Then: You are the one in charge of who is taking part in the release or not! But you also need to win the trust of the rest of the players that you are leading them to the win...
Pick-a-team
Now vote! The twist of the game is executing the sprint. Is it successful thanks to the effort of the development or management team?
Hint: developers trust only other developers. managers know someone needs to "manage the resources"
If the developers execute 3 successful sprints they win!
Unless!
The managers guess correctly who the CTO is. Then they win!

The gameplay is extremely addicting because the longer you play, the more you fall into it and the more intense the game gets.

216514.name: Reap the Whirlwind (Revised)
216514.description:
From publisher blurb:

Welcome to the Chronicles of Darkness.

A world like our own, but glitzier, sexier, and much, much bloodier. You are one of the Kindred, the immortal predators that stalk the world between the streetlights.

You are also a vampire, a junkie. Every night, you beg and you borrow and you steal just a little more life, just a few more sweet moments. But there's a guy at the top. The Prince. He's got everything. The money, the secrets, the blood.

Tonight, you're going to take it from him. Tomorrow, there'll be hell to pay.

This updated edition of Reap the Whirlwind features revisions to match the core rulebook for Vampire: the Requiem 2nd Edition. Text edits and rules clarifications have also been updated.

Reap the Whirlwind Revised includes:

Rules for creating and playing vampires in the Chronicles of Darkness
The first two levels of every clan Discipline, the dark powers of the dead
A complete adventure by noted horror author Chuck Wendig




This new revised Reap the Whirlwind Revised includes an updated booklet, 7 condition cards, and the interactive Vampire: the Requiem 2nd Edition character sheet.

216517.name: Broch Groddath
216517.description:
From the PDF:

The adventurers are hired to find an unusual object that is believed to be among the collections of a strange, disgraced family, in a great home that is shunned. The item is indeed there, as are clues about the family and its fall...and worse things...

BROCH GRODDATH is a “haunted house” scenario, with its own defining twists. Its key features are creepy atmosphere, disorientation, and horror. It touches on several genres and themes, including Low Fantasy, Sword and Sorcery, Cosmic Horror, and Dungeon Crawling. A fantasy milieu is assumed, but with moderate changes it could be played in a modern Lovecraftian setting.

This is intended as a one-shot adventure, to be dropped into an existing campaign, without larger implications (unless desired). Probably two sessions are needed to play it out. The scenario is written for four adventurers, but three or five should be fine. Four sample characters are included, for an instant start to a weekend’s fun.

Mechanical details have been constructed using the MYTHRAS game system from The Design Mechanism. The write-up should translate well to other d100-style rules (and still other systems, with more work).

216518.name: Cavaliers of Mars Jumpstart: A Festival of Blades
216518.description:
(publisher blurb)

Return now to dying Mars in its last age of glory. A planet of flashing swords and choking sands, of winking courtesans and lantern-lit canal cities. Mars, where fortune and death are two sides of the same obsidian chit, where lost cities and dry oceans stretch between the last bastions of civilization. Where the First Martians, the monument-builders, are but a haunted memory. Where the Red Martians become decadent and reckless in their last days. Where the Pale Martians rule the wastes, remembering a history whose weight would crush a lesser people.

In this adventure, you’ll find yourself in Vance at festival time. When revolutionaries strike a visiting prince, you’ll need to explore the city’s dark underbelly, before racing across its towered tombs!

Live, fight, and love on Mars, a world of red death and strange mystery, a world of savagery and romance.

Includes:

A complete adventure set in one of dying Mars’ greatest remaining cities.
The innovative DEIMOS rules, for high-flying, swashbuckling adventure.
Four pre-generated player characters, ready to get into the heart of the action.

216519.name: Kalijor RPG
216519.description:
From the book cover:
Features: Play with or without dice!
A complete new, skill, ability, and spell system. Combat can be story driven with bonuses and play by play rolls, or quick and dirty with higher level skill rolls.

Explore Virtual Reality as you attempt to hack through firewalls and other network security.
Build your own space ship to haul cargo, transport people, or harry Conglomerate forces.
Build your character from an extensive list of cybernetic upgrades, genetic modifications, or special abilities; or try to take on the world as a good old basic human being. Then switch to Kalijor and access an impressive list of spells and equipment.

Play as employees of any of the 'Big Five' corporations that make up the Conglomerate, trying to maintain order and harmony, or as the outcast Dissidents, trying to make ends meet on the fringes of society, or strike out against the Conglomerate.

Play a science fiction campaign, a fantasy campaign, or move back and forth between worlds as your story requires. You decide!

216520.name: Kalijor: Kids RPG
216520.description:
From the book cover:
A complete new Role Playing Game for kids of all ages.
The Kalijor: Kids RPG is compatible with the Kalijor RPG and all of its sourcebooks and suppliments.

Features:

∆ Play with or without dice!

∆ A complete new skill, ability, and magic system.

∆ Help kids learn to use skills and logic to solve in-game puzzles, both social and logical.

∆ Encourage team-work and group problem solving amongst players of all ages.

∆ Little to no logistical 'down time': pick a character and jump right in!

Play as employees of any of the 'Big Five' corporations that make up the Conglomerate, trying to
maintain order and harmony, or as the outcast Dissidents, working to make ends meet on the
fringes of society or striking back against the omnipresent Conglomerate.

Teach your kids to play on their own, or play along with them. Either way, when they're ready,
their characters will transfer directly into the full Kalijor RPG system.

rpgseries: PER - Living Greyhawk Perrenland Regional Adventures
216521.name: The Schwartzstadt Heresy Part 1: A "Nation Mocked" Adventure
216521.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Perrenland Regional Adventure

From the introduction:

Perrenland’s spiritual leader, the Hetvoorshoolmann, has called a conclave of the faithful to meet in Ulmt, the spiritual capital of the Old Kerk. As a result of this decree, druids, clerics and bards of the Old Kerk are now travelling in great numbers towards this town. Rumor-mongers are saying that a division has formed within the Old Kerk, and this division is being called the “Schwartzstadt Heresy”.

This is a Perrenland regional adventure for APLs 2-16.

216522.name: Brother's Love Lost
rpgseries: PER - Living Greyhawk Perrenland Regional Adventures
216522.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Perrenland Regional Adventure

From the introduction:

Two men stood facing each other on a windswept hilltop; so similar in appearance that they had to be brothers. The younger brother looked at the elder with anger in his eyes:

"So this is how you want it then? Well, know this – I will never forgive you of this betrayal. We were brothers, but from this time forward we are no longer!" The younger man disappeared in a flash of shadow. The older brother watched the younger brother disappear with a tear in his eye. "No brother, it was you who betrayed me! But you are my brother, and I forgive you," he whispered to the wind.

A woman appeared by his side with a faint rustle of leaves. She placed her hand on his shoulder. "Come, husband, it is time to go. Business will not take care of itself." He smiled sadly, nodded, and they both disappeared.

An ancient temple found, a pirate conspiracy foiled, and innocent man saved. Now, the final part of the drama is ready to be played out. Do you have the cunning, strength of arms, and the charisma to end this tale of a brother's love lost? This is a Perrenland regional adventure, which begins in the city of Meerstadt.

It is for APLs 6-12. Sea legs may be required.

It is Part 3 in the Brother’s Love series of adventures.

rpgseries: PER - Living Greyhawk Perrenland Regional Adventures
216523.name: A Nation Mocked: Relief Mission
216523.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Perrenland Regional Adventure

From the introduction:

The vampire lord Drelnza has taken over her mother’s old home of Kir Russ and has begun expanding her holdings into the surrounding region. A cry for help from a new ally has adventurers making their way to Khundholm, from where a relief mission will be dispatched.

A one-round Regional adventure set in Perrenland for APLs 4-12.

Khund and members of the Old Kerk may find this adventure to their liking.

rpgseries: PER - Living Greyhawk Perrenland Regional Adventures
216524.name: Supply Run
216524.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Perrenland Regional Introductory Adventure

From the introduction:

The Kershane Pass is at the crossroads between Perrenland and Highfolk. It is also the site of one of Perrenland’s bloodiest battles, and home to four different Clans. With Iuz no longer attacking The Pass, tension between the Clans is increasing. Are you willing to help the Auszug in this time of trouble and travel through The Pass to resupply the soldiers of Perrenland?

A Perrenland Regional Introductory Adventure for 1st Level characters only.

rpgseries: PER - Living Greyhawk Perrenland Regional Adventures
216525.name: An Axe to Grind
216525.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Perrenland Regional Introductory Adventure

From the introduction:

It's all fun and games 'til someone loses an eye.

- Vecna




Rikkendál is busy this time of year. The town has twice owed a debt to bands of adventurers and in the year 596 shows its gratitude at the Needfest celebrations. At this time adventurers can come for a free feast and a full week of fun and games. But soup isn't the only thing brewing in the small town...

An introductory scenario for 1st level characters only set around Fireseek in the Concatenated Cantons of Perrenland.

rpgseries: PER - Living Greyhawk Perrenland Regional Adventures
216526.name: Broken Spears
216526.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Perrenland Regional Mini-Adventure

From the introduction:

The Weisspeer clan are famous for the breeding and rearing of their Weisspeer hill ponies. But in this time of war, horses are in high demand and are a valuable tool in the Auszug arsenal. The Weisspeer clan is conflicted over the role that their specific breed should play... a conflict which has come to a head in the small town of Bokheuvel.

A scenario for APLs 2 to 8 of particular interest to Weisspeer clan members.

rpgseries: PER - Living Greyhawk Perrenland Regional Adventures
216527.name: Lifesavers
216527.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Perrenland Regional Mini-Adventure

From the introduction:

What happens in Perrenland does not always stay in Perrenland. The Perrenland ambassador to Greyhawk city has been recalled to deal with some local intra-clan problems. In these dark and troubled times though, a clan divided weakens all clans and has implications for the nation as a whole.

A Perrenland interactive for PCs of character levels 6 - 15.

rpgseries: PER - Living Greyhawk Perrenland Regional Adventures
216528.name: Where Roodbergs Fear to Tread
216528.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Perrenland Regional Adventure

From the introduction:

Sometimes the simplest of tasks can take you to exotic places and see you doing unexpected things. Couriers are needed to deliver a confidential document to the secluded grey elven city of Kershane, high in the forested mountains of the Clatspur Ranges. It has only been three years since Kershane emerged from four and a half centuries of magicallyimposed isolation from the rest of the Oerth: what opportunities for adventure can those couriers find in the city and the surrounding forests?

A one-round Perrenland regional adventure for APLs 2-12 that is particularly recommended for members of Clan Kershane, for elves and half-elves, and for lovers of nature. Members of Clan Roodberg may prefer to seek adventure elsewhere.

rpgseries: PER - Living Greyhawk Perrenland Regional Adventures
216529.name: Needle in a Haystack
216529.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Perrenland Regional Adventure

From the introduction:

Somewhere on the vast plains of the Chakyik horde lies the body of a man crucial to the defence of Perrenland. Hardy folk are needed to find and retrieve the corpse, no questions asked, but you can always count on the Tiger Nomads to be inquisitive types...

A one-round Perrenland Regional adventure set in the Canton of Yattenhied for APLs 4-12.

A Nation Mocked, Part 8

rpgseries: PER - Living Greyhawk Perrenland Regional Adventures
216530.name: Discord's Harmony
216530.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Perrenland Regional Adventure

From the introduction:

The search for the truth brings you back to the holy city of Ulmt. The city wilts under the division that has spread in the ranks of the Old Kerk and is awash with rumors of murder in the holy city. With the division in the faith growing, will the truth repair the damage done or just make the situation worse?

A one-round Regional adventure set in Perrenland for APLs 4-12.

rpgseries: PER - Living Greyhawk Perrenland Regional Adventures
216531.name: In the Court of the Famine Queen
216531.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Perrenland Regional Adventure

From the introduction:

The drow have retreated to The Hollows, and Mount Hellspaar is no longer smoking. So what dark gloom still hangs over the Canton of Traft? It is the Blue Blight. And the famine. And the hold of the Witch Queen’s daughter – who appears to have made Traft City her new, private, domain. Aristocrats, city autocrats, and commoners alike are at each other’s throats. Are you ready for this?

This is a one-round Perrenland regional adventure set in Traft Canton for APLs 2-12.

rpgseries: PER - Living Greyhawk Perrenland Regional Adventures
216532.name: The Jasmine Index
216532.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Perrenland Regional Adventure

From the introduction:

The spread of the Heresy is set to shatter the unity of Perrenland, so why you are at the annual cheese and wine festival of Cli? Surely this has to be either a cruel joke by the Voormann or a way for your enemies to keep you out of the way whilst they hatch their horrible plots? Or perhaps it is both. Yet on Cli, the heartland of Flan lore and learning in the Quaglands, an opportunity may present itself to discover the answers to certain questions, answers that have eluded you so far.

A one-round Perrenland Regional adventure for APLs 4-12.

216533.name: The Diadem of Kir Russ - Part One
rpgseries: PER - Living Greyhawk Perrenland Regional Adventures
216533.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Perrenland Regional Adventure

From the introduction:

From the Isle of Cli a mission sets out to discover the ancient weapon that can defeat the evil plaguing Perrenland for far too long. But with only a thousand year old instrument and a prophesy to go on, will this expectation prove to be true?

Part one of a three-round Perrenland Regional adventure for APLs 2-14.

216534.name: The Diadem of Kir Russ - Part Two
rpgseries: PER - Living Greyhawk Perrenland Regional Adventures
216534.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Perrenland Regional Adventure

From the introduction:

From the Isle of Cli a mission sets out to discover the ancient weapon that can defeat the evil plaguing Perrenland for far too long. But with only a thousand year old instrument and a prophesy to go on, will this expectation prove to be true?

Part two of a three-round Perrenland Regional adventure for APLs 2-14.

216535.name: The Diadem of Kir Russ - Part Three
rpgseries: PER - Living Greyhawk Perrenland Regional Adventures
216535.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Perrenland Regional Adventure

From the introduction:

From the Isle of Cli a mission sets out to discover the ancient weapon that can defeat the evil plaguing Perrenland for far too long. But with only a thousand year old instrument and a prophesy to go on, will this expectation prove to be true?

Part three of a three-round Perrenland Regional adventure for APLs 2-14.

rpgseries: PER - Living Greyhawk Perrenland Regional Adventures
216536.name: Lost Voice
216536.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Perrenland Introductory Adventure

From the introduction:

When a noted vocalist doesn’t show up to a performance, his instrumentalist wants to know why. A trip to his settlement leads to a search for the Lost Voice.

A one-round Introductory adventure set in Perrenland for Level 1 characters.

rpgseries: PER - Living Greyhawk Perrenland Regional Adventures
216537.name: Matthias' Missing Materials
216537.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Perrenland Introductory Adventure

From the introduction:

Matthias runs a small store in Schwartzenbruin, but his shelves are oddly empty. Can you help find spell components and potion ingredients, or will there be less magic available to the armies fighting Drelnza?

A one-round Regional adventure set in Perrenland for first level characters only.

rpgseries: PER - Living Greyhawk Perrenland Regional Adventures
216538.name: Heads of the Family
216538.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Perrenland Introductory Adventure

From the introduction:

The people of Perrenland are either famous or notorious (depending on who you talk to) for preserving the heads of their honoured ancestors and their enemies. These heads are important to their owners, so you wouldn't normally expect to find one on the streets of Schwartzenbruin.

A one-round Introductory adventure set in Perrenland for characters level 1.

rpgseries: PER - Living Greyhawk Perrenland Regional Adventures
216539.name: Waves of Tidal Fury
216539.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Perrenland Regional Adventure

From the introduction:

Rumors of an increase in pirate activity on the lake near Meerstadt have reached the city. Many ships have recently failed to make it to the ports, adding to the veracity of the rumors. Nonetheless, trade and re-supply of the city's resources have been gravely affected and the city has hit a standstill, especially in this time of rebuilding. The Zee Auszug are looking for adventurers. Perhaps it is to stop this scourge on maritime movement, or perhaps it is to manage the mayhem some other way?

A one-round Perrenland Regional adventure of particular interest to members of the fighting forces and set in the city of Meerstadt and on Lake Quag for APLs 2-8.

rpgseries: PER - Living Greyhawk Perrenland Regional Adventures
216540.name: The Greatest Show on Oerth
216540.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Perrenland Regional Adventure

From the introduction:

Roll up, roll up, welcome to Den Masque von Tausend Gesichtern, the Greatest Show on Oerth. Be amazed by fantastic beasts, caged and chained for your pleasure. Marvel at the strange and unusual people the like of which you have never seen before. Gasp at the breathtaking skill of our performers. All in a perfectly safe environment, dangerous outsiders notwithstanding...

A one-round Perrenland Regional adventure set near Schwartzenbruin for characters level 1-11.

rpgseries: PER - Living Greyhawk Perrenland Regional Adventures
216541.name: Return to the Quaglands
216541.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Perrenland Regional Adventure

From the introduction:

A sudden crisis leaves Schwartzenbruin at risk of a devastating attack by the forces of evil. Heroes are needed to travel to the Quaglands in search of a stop-gap solution – but can they find what they're looking for in time?

A one-round Perrenland Regional adventure starting in Schwartzenbruin for APLs 6-12

rpgseries: PER - Living Greyhawk Perrenland Regional Adventures
216542.name: Signed in Blood and Sap
216542.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Perrenland Regional Adventure

From the introduction:

Sometimes a deal is struck. Sometimes a bargain is made. Sometimes, when payment is due, the price is very high. Valeska Nachtkrijsen has just paid the ultimate price. How much will the deal she was party to making cost all of Perrenland?

A one-round Perrenland Regional adventure set in and around Krestible for characters level 1-11.

rpgseries: PER - Living Greyhawk Perrenland Regional Adventures
216543.name: The Hus Factor
216543.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Perrenland Regional Adventure

From the introduction:

Drelnza and her armies are defeated, the heresy is no more and the famine is all but over. With new leadership providing much need unity, Perrenland may finally be able to turn to a better page for the future. But with the celebrations following the new Voorman’s coronation already under way, will there be any final secrets that wait to threaten Perrenland’s tomorrow?

A single round Perrenland Regional adventure for APLs 2-14.

This adventure is the finale for the Perrenland Region.

rpgseries: PER - Living Greyhawk Perrenland Regional Adventures
216544.name: Tail's End
216544.description:
A Two-Round Living Greyhawk Perrenland Special Adventure

From the introduction:

The new traditional land owner of Laufgen, Berrund Lutgere, has used his authority over the last year to make some significant improvements to the town, not the least of which is repairing and restocking the town armory. Swords! For everybody! But there seems to be a rat in his plans – one with black wings, of the arcane persuasion. Perhaps you can help?

A challenging two-round Living Greyhawk special mission set in Perrenland for characters level 10-14.

rpgseries: PER - Living Greyhawk Perrenland Regional Adventures
216545.name: Love Story
216545.description:
Of Love, Revenge, and the Baleful Animation of the Great Contrabulous Fantraption, Magnus Opus of the Irrepressible Eugene Raticus Maximus

From the introduction:

Mid spring every year, worshipers of Myriss, goddess of love, make or renew vows of true love in her honor. Donning flowers of yellow and white (or blue), they seek to find the one who will answer the call of their heart. This year will see host to the largest festival ever – the mid spring celebration is to be held on the shores of lake Quag near Schwatzenbrun, the romantic swaying of the barges matched only by the beauty of a full moon lit sky. Surely there could not be a more picturesque and tranquil scene for finding true love...?

A sense of humor and love of role-play are necessary to enjoy this scenario.

User summary:

For obscure reasons, this scenario was published in two separate versions, each with a different product code and page count. However, both versions are nearly identical. The PERI8-01 version is dated one month later than the PERSM8-04.1 version.

216546.name: Rational Fear
216546.description:
From the introduction:

An adventure for a home Greyhawk Campaign Set in Perrenland

The people of Danelg live in fear. They fear going to sleep because every night every person is plagued with nightmares. Fear is often described as irrational, but maybe it can be a rational fear – if there is a rational reason. This adventure serves as a good introduction for Players unfamiliar with Perrenland.

Part 1 of the Legacy of the Black Rider.

A two-round adventure set in Perrenland for characters levels 1 - 10.

216547.name: Atrocities
216547.description:
From the introduction:

An adventure for a home Greyhawk Campaign Set in Perrenland

Perrenland has suffered through years of conflict. The people are hurt, loved ones have been lost, and the horrors of war and famine will not be forgotten. Through this damaged land walks Nathanal, suffering from the effects of a single atrocity performed many years ago. This man seeks redemption.

Part 1 of Heroes Lost.

A two round adventure set in Perrenland for characters levels 2 - 14.

216548.name: Ekbir
rpgseries: EKB - Living Greyhawk Ekbir Regional Adventures
216548.description:
From the introduction:

Over a millennium ago, the Invoked Devastation overthrown the Baklunish Empire. Gathered around the only intact site, the Stone Circles of Tovag Baragu, the survivors were dying. Al’Akbar entered the Inner Circle and prayed the gods. He was heard and celestial messengers brought the Cup and the Talisman to the prophet who could, thanks to their abilities, help his people. Running away from those inhospitable lands, he headed the refugees toward the North. Reaching the shores of the Dramidj ocean, he built the city of Ekbir. After his death, a mausoleum was dedicated to him and the town of Ekbir became a Holy City and object of pilgrimage. The successors of Al'Akbar to the head of the country were called caliphs. Thus was born the Caliphate of Ekbir.

216549.name: Ekbir Organisations Métaludiques
rpgseries: EKB - Living Greyhawk Ekbir Regional Adventures
216549.description:
User summary:

This item presents the various mega-organizations that were allowable for play during the Living Greyhawk organized play events in the Ekbir region.

Although the title is in French (and the play region was apportioned to France), almost all of the document is in English.

216550.name: Guide d'Ekbir
rpgseries: EKB - Living Greyhawk Ekbir Regional Adventures
216550.description:
Cadre pour les joueurs et les auteurs de scénarios pour la
campagne Living Greyhawk en France

From the introduction:

Les Ekbiriens utilisent deux calendriers qui sont le calendrier baklunien traditionnel et le calendrier akbarite. L’origine du calendrier baklunien remonte à une date mythique, la fondation de l’Empire baklunien avec l’avènement de la Première Dynastie. La date actuelle dans ce calendrier est 3251 HB (pour Hégire Baklunienne).

216552.name: Utah Geek Magazine (Issue 13 - Nov/Dec 2016)
rpgissuearticle: Alyson Peterson: The Original Princess of Garfel

216553.name: Game Trade Magazine (Issue 202 - Dec 2016)
rpgissuearticle: The Adventures of the Red Headed League
Tricks of the Game Trade Tip #9
216553.description:
Game Trade Magazine
Issue 202
December 2016

Includes The Adventure of the Red Headed League - an official scenario and Game Trade Magazine exclusive for Baker Street.

216554.name: Literati
216554.description:
Description from the back of the box:

Literati is a new word game that combines obscure words and quotations with your own creative and often hilarious definitions. No genius is required, merely the ability to outwit your opponents. Advance around the board by simply identifying correct definitions and/or tricking your opponents into believing bogus definitions which you have created…"

Literati contains 400 word cards with categories and sample words, including: GENERAL: uxorious – excessively fond of one’s wife; SCIENCE: piblokto – a psychic disturbance seen chiefly among Eskimo women marked by attacks of hysteria and running naked through the snow; FOREIGN: kater (German) – hangover; SLANG: dismal ditty – a song sung by a criminal just before his death at the gallows; and, QUOTE: "...And I don’t like parties of any kind." ~Dick Clark

Game play is similar to Balderdash, and other Fictionary/Dictionary-type games.

216555.name: Argle Bargle
216555.description:
Description from the publisher:

"The game where you insult your friends"

Each player is dealt 10 cards and 5 lives. The object of the game is to use your cards to create hilarious insults that score damage points that remove the "lives" from your opponents. The last player left with lives wins.

Each card has two words are phrases on it and an associated point value with each one. Play proceeds clockwise starting with the player left of the dealer.

Each turn the player can either play an insult on anyone at the table OR exchange any amount of cards from their hand for new cards. An insult is 4 or more cards that when read aloud, form a complete sentence that insults another player. Example:

YOUR JACKED, BUCK-TOOTHED GRANDFATHER LIKES TO SPOON WITH A NEUROTIC, TINY CHICKEN!

The player lays down the cards that forms their insult, points to a player they are insulting, and reads the sentence aloud. You imply the punctuation with how you speak the sentence. So say it like you mean it!

You then total the points on the read side of each card in the insult (upper right corner).
If this total is 5 or more, the insulted player loses 1 life.
If the total is 10 or more, the insulted player loses 2 lives
If the total is 15 or more, the insulted player loses 3 lives, AND the insulting player takes one of the lost lives and adds it to their own lives.

There are "Reversal" and "Redirect" cards that the insulted player can play to deflect an insult. The insulting player can play a "BOOM" card at the end of their insult to make it unreversable and unredirectable.

Argle Bargle is a casual game, but it takes more than luck to best your opponents. It requires creativity and strategy.

There are no dirty or offensive words in this version.

216556.description:
Description from the publisher:

Blood on the Altar is the third Mythos Pack in The Dunwich Legacy cycle for Arkham Horror: The Card Game.

In the scenario from Blood on the Altar, your investigations lead you to the village of Dunwich, where you suspect a series of recent disappearances may be related to the events in Arkham. But the more you explore, the more you get the impression the townsfolk aren't exactly pleased to see you. There are secrets in this town that its inhabitants don't wish to share…

With its sixty cards (including a complete playset of each new player card), Blood on the Altar challenges you to delve the secrets of Dunwich. You'll need to travel throughout the town in search of clues, stopping to investigate many of the locations infamously identified in H.P. Lovecraft's classic tale, The Dunwich Horror.
216556.name: Arkham Horror: The Card Game – Blood on the Altar – Mythos Pack
boardgamefamily: Arkham Horror: The Card Game LCG

216557.description:
This set contains 600 questions and answers about Dinosaurs on 100 cards from the following categories:

Traits
Pop Culture
Friends, Foes and Families
Discoveries
Habits
Name-it

This set can be used as an expansion along with any Trivial Pursuit base game or played stand-alone with the enclosed rules and customized die.
216557.name: Trivial Pursuit: Dinosaurs

216558.name: Pucca's Race for Kisses
216558.description:
User Summary

A platform game were the purpose is to catch Garu and kiss him to complete the level. Pucca continuously moves and you press A to perform an action (like jumping). You pause the game with B then select which item you wish you use with A (such as a katana for cutting bamboo or shuriken for defeating ninja. The game feels like playing a movie with the pause feature, and if you die by hitting an obstacle, the game rewinds a little and lets you carry on.

216559.name: Panzer Vor Ausf. 2
216559.description:
A wargame based off the anime "Girls und Panzer der Film". This game use same the tank units as the earlier game Panzer Vor!, but uses alternate character units and new game engine because focus to more larger tankery battle,

Each player has 30 tanks and some leaders. In the set-up, players organize their platoons from 1 to 4 tanks.
In the game, players alternate resolve an action, movement, attack, re-organize, card play or pass.

Victory conditions are defined for each scenario, the basic purpose is to destroy opponent tanks.

The game include 2 scenarios for first part and second part of Oarai vs University team. These two scenarios can be play continuously as a campaign game.
And also include 2 scenarios for "Panzer Vor!" based off first part of "Girls und Panzer der Film".

216561.description:
This map is an unofficial fan made expansion. Symbols & Graphics Copyright © 2004-2015 Days of Wonder, Inc. Produced with permission of Days of Wonder, for non-commercial use only.

This follows the principles of the basic Ticket to Ride game on a special board with special cards and rules. The object of the game is to gain the most points by travelling various routes and outwitting other players. You will need the train pieces and the train cards from either the US or Europe base games (or you can buy them from the Days of Wonder shop.

There is an extra set of Tourist cards for the cities, each with a value to be earned by visiting that city. These cards are dealt/picked up alongwith tickets in the same quantity and with the same 'keep/dispose' rules.

There are also spanners along some tracks which may help or hinder you. The board does not have any grey tracks or parallel tracks - but there are some options in the spanner pack.

Mountain railway excursions and 9 bonuses give you extra points.

There are many new options in the rules: exchange all your cards at the start but keep all the new ones: discard 5 cards and pick up 5 new ones, as your turn: earn double points: and many more. You can also call time when your wagon stock reaches 3, if you want, giving you the advantage of stopping other players completing tickets.
216561.name: South Korea (fan expansion of Ticket to Ride)

216562.name: Limpeh Says
216562.description:
Description from the publisher:

Limpeh Says is a card game for we the citizens of Singapore, containing 550 unique, localised cards revolving around the culture we've built here in our little country.

Guided by the ideology of being 'morally wrong but politically right', it includes topics from food, to National Service, and everything else in between.

The game is as simple as it gets. Each round, one player draws a Red Card. Everyone else answers with their best white card. The funniest combination wins.

216563.description:
A new weapon promo card for Adrenaline that was included in German magazine spielbox issue No. 7/2016.

When used in basic mode, the player chooses 1 target within sight. That target receives a mark.

In alternate fire mode, the player can choose 1 or 2 targets within sight. One target receives 2 damage, the other target receives 1 damage.

Reloading the Laser Magnum costs no ammo. When you play the Laser Magnum, it becomes unloaded, just like any other weapon, even though reloading it during the reload step costs nothing.
216563.name: Adrenaline: Laser-Magnum

216565.name: Scary Little Christmas
216565.description:
From publisher blurb:

'Tis the season to be creepy! "Scary Little Christmas" serves up three Christmas-themed installment seeds for Stories from the Grave that will keep you and your group enthralled throughout the rest of the holiday season.

"... And All Through the House"
"A Dolly for Johnny"
"The Yuletide Monster"

216566.name: Summoner Spells IV (PRD)
216566.description:
From publisher blurb:

Echelon Reference Series: Summoner Spells is a simple document that collects the summoner spell list, and all spells in it, for easy use. The spell lists are broken up by level and school, and the spells of each level are grouped together and organized by name.

This is a subset of the entire book, containing only the 4th-level summoner spells.

This is the PRD-Only version, containing information from the PRD.

216567.name: Summoner Spells IV (3PP)
216567.description:
From publisher blurb:

Echelon Reference Series: Summoner Spells is a simple document that collects the summoner spell list, and all spells in it, for easy use. The spell lists are broken up by level and school, and the spells of each level are grouped together and organized by name.

This is a subset of the entire book, containing only the 4th-level summoner spells.

This is the 3pp+PRD version, containing information from the PRD and select third-party products.

216568.name: Heart of the Fury
216568.description:
From publisher blurb:

Heart of the Fury is an extended campaign for Bulldogs! This book contains a series of adventures designed to challenge your crew and to shake the whole galaxy. Big changes are coming, and your players are right at the heart of them. A strange new group has emerged, the Fury, and they are busy trying to capture the Frontier Zone. What’s driving them, and why do their enemies keep surrendering and switching sides? Ancient mysteries, wide-ranging war in the Frontier Zone, and deadly threats from the great Empires. Sounds like a mission for Class D!

Written by Gareth Hanrahan, this 260-page adventure campaign includes a dozen different adventures, and new rules for your Bulldogs! campaign. A new Psychic skill and stunts to add mental powers to your game, three new playable alien species, and an excellent example of how how to craft a full arc campaign to your own Bulldogs! game.

216569.name: Krampus: A Monster for 5th Edition
216569.description:
From publisher blurb:

Krampus is a devil who once a year is unleashed into the world to kidnap as many wicked children as he can stuff into his basket and carry them back to the frigid netherworld that is his home to serve as slaves. He appears at a different place each year on the night of the Winter Solstice and works his evil until dawn, when he disappears with whatever victims he has managed to capture by then. He also accompanies St. Nicholas in the lands where he is active. While the saint rewards good children with presents, however, Krampus gives bad ones lumps of coal and threatens to return the following year and drag them off to Hell if they do not mend their ways.

This publication contains:

A detailed description for Krampus.
Complete 5th Edition statistics for this fiendish monster.

216570.name: The Mrawgh
rpgseries: Remarkable Races: Pathway to Adventure Edition
216570.description:
From publisher blurb:

Remarkable Races is going beneath the waves in a new series called "Remarkable Races Submerged." These new racial supplements will add an aquatic flair to our beloved Remarkable Races line, transforming many of your favorite races for use with the Cerulean Seas Campaign Setting, as well as introducing a few new ones.

What do you get when you cross a caveman with an ancient killing machine from the Devonian Age? You get a brutish proto-merfolk known as a mrawgh! In this 5th chapter of the RRS series, we take the Mahrogs of Remarkable Races' fame and re-conceptualize them under the waves. So if you ever pined for simpler times, it doesn't get any more primitive than this! Of course, the mrawghs follow the same great format as the other races with colorful original art, complete rules and extras, and are ready to play immediately.

216571.name: Darkfire Adept
216571.description:
From publisher blurb:

The darkfire adept works for the ultimate goal; the annihilation of reality and a return to primal nothingness. Not popular even at the best of times, believers in the end times are usually shunned or shut away as madmen. But a few of these fanatics manage to reach out to the power of darkfire, the cleansing flame they believe will ultimately undo all creation. Darkfire adepts seek to further the end of all things. They do this by undermining the very structure of the universe, breaking the boundaries between the planes and setting planar fiends free to wreak havoc. Some show their allegiance openly and go preaching, others hide behind a veneer of civilized behavior and seek to unravel society from within.

Prestige Class: Blackfire adept

Build Class Options: The darkfire adept is built on the wizard, but the following optional build classes are described below: arcanist, cleric, oracle, psychic, sacerdote, sorcerer, summoner, and witch.

Role: The blackfire adept is a consummate summoner of evil creatures.

216572.name: Broek 18
216572.description:
A boardgame for two tired parents trying to keep their household running. Fighting against the clock and the little overlord of chaos, will they manage to have any happiness points by nightfall?

Two parents play one day or 17 hours against one little toddler who moves randomly in the house creating mess each turn.Each hour is one turn in which the parents have to spend action points to move around the house to clean, to do the household chores and toe spend time on 'events', some more chores or unexpected chaos or activities with the toddler, leading to more mess but also to happyness.

The mess arrives in a spot due to an event, a chore not managed or the little toddler moving around. If this is not removed before more mess arrives at the location, it becomes harder to clean and in a next level breaks that location so no chores or events can take place.

A clean house, rest and fun activities give happyness points, a too messy house and not managing the chores leads to less happyness. So both parents have to work together to plan the best schedule, when to be where in the house, who does which activity and who runs after the toddler to balance the keeping the house in order and to score happyness points.

216573.name: A Christmas Carol
216573.description:
From publisher blurb:

Tonight you will be visited by three Ghosts. . .

Major financiers of corporations and banks in the city have started liquidating assets and donating millions to charity. The craziest part being, none are willing to say the sudden change of heart, but one billionaire isn’t willing to be a target and will contract the players to help him get to the bottom of his co-worker’s claim of being visited by “ghosts.”

216574.name: A Very Scary Xmos
216574.description:
From publisher blurb:

A Swords & Wizardry Holiday Special Mini-Dungeon
For 4-6 Adventurers of Levels 1-3

Three sages warn of the return of Xmos, a demonically possessed archdruid that was banished to Limbo eons ago. His minions have gathered to prepare for his return. They must be defeated and Xmos banished back to Limbo.

A Very Scary Xmos is a holiday themed mini-dungeon filled with horrible puns. The above image has nothing to do with it really. It was cheap and we needed to put something there. So, you know, enjoy. And have a happy one!

216575.name: Dare the Stars!: The Future as it Once Was
216575.description:
From publisher blurb:

THE FUTURE AS IT ONCE WAS!

This is a Role-Playing game of high adventure in a retro-science fiction setting, inspired by the classic “pulp” comics and novels of the 30’s - 50’s - stories where the author’s imagination had free reign, “science” was mostly a useful backdrop and the narration was full of bigger-than-life heroes.
In its pages you’ll learn how to create, use and advance your hero in the footprints of such characters as John Carter of Mars, Flash Gordon and Dan Dare. You’ll be a clever scientist, bringing your inventions with you in space; or a daring explorer, braving the dangers of unknown planets; a wise spacer with his strange powers, or a technologically advanced android.

Come into a world that was the future as our fathers imagined it!

216576.description:
Description from the publisher:'

100 Swords is a sword based dungeon crawling micro deck builder! Load up with as much as you can carry and run head first into the dungeon, exploring rooms and revealing monsters, all while keeping track of hidden treasures and swords!

During play, you must efficiently play the 5 cards in your hand for any combination of movement, strength, or energy. Movement advances you deeper into the dungeon allowing you to peek at or reveal the cards along the way. Monsters you find can only be defeated with strength. New items (and swords!) are acquired by spending cards in your hand for energy. Many items have effects that will further expand your tactical options as your deck grows.

As you defeat monsters and pick up loot, do your best to remember where everything is hidden. Treasures and slain monsters are worth gold, so get collecting! Once the dungeon has been thoroughly ransacked, or the boss is defeated, whoever has the most gold wins!

You can use Dungeon Builder Sets to spice up your dungeon. Each set contains 15 cards (including a new Boss) that can be slapped onto a standalone dungeon to lengthen your game and add new challenges and puzzles to solve! The Gardenin Elm's Dungeon Builder Set features a unique take on card vaporization. It has an interesting variety of new monsters, items, and obstacles.
216576.name: 100 Swords: The Gardenin' Elm's Dungeon Builder Set

216577.description:
100 Swords is a sword based dungeon crawling micro deck builder! Load up with as much as you can carry and run head first into the dungeon, exploring rooms and revealing monsters, all while keeping track of hidden treasures and swords!

During play, you must efficiently play the 5 cards in your hand for any combination of movement, strength, or energy. Movement advances you deeper into the dungeon allowing you to peek at or reveal the cards along the way. Monsters you find can only be defeated with strength. New items (and swords!) are acquired by spending cards in your hand for energy. Many items have effects that will further expand your tactical options as your deck grows.

As you defeat monsters and pick up loot, do your best to remember where everything is hidden. Treasures and slain monsters are worth gold, so get collecting! Once the dungeon has been thoroughly ransacked, or the boss is defeated, whoever has the most gold wins!

You can use Dungeon Builder Sets to spice up your dungeon. Each set contains 15 cards (including a new Boss) that can be slapped onto a standalone dungeon to lengthen your game and add new challenges and puzzles to solve! The Heads of the Hydra Dungeon Builder Set features a battle against hydra head monsters. For each head of The Hydra you have defeated, the weaker the boss becomes. It also has an interesting variety of new monsters, items, and obstacles.
216577.name: 100 Swords: The Heads of the Hydra Dungeon Builder Set

216578.name: Half-Pint Heroes
216578.description:
In the Half-Pint Pub, tempers are running hot. You can almost feel the tension in the air. Most patrons have already chosen sides, with very few even trying to stay out of the conflict. So far they're still just throwing insults instead of bar stools, but any moment things could break down into a full-out brawl...

Game Summary:

Half-Pint Heroes is an easy to learn, but hard to master, card game for 2-7 players. Players will play sets of cards from their hands each round to beat the sets of their opponents. You'll also need to be able to correctly assess the strength of your hand in order to predict how many sets you'll win each round. Once the predictions are revealed, players will also be able to bet against each other reaching their goal.

You'll need to stay alert and keep an eye your opponent's plays to avoid letting a brawl break out. If that happens, only one player will walk away a winner...

The game is played over 10 rounds. Points are scored for each winning card set, for correctly predicting your number of winning sets, and for correctly betting against other player's predictions. Additionally, bonus points are scored at the end of the game for the longest streak of correct predictions.

216579.name: Paladin Sacred Oaths
216579.description:
From the introduction:

At 3rd level, a paladin gains the Sacred Oath feature. Here are new options for that feature: the Oath of Conquest and the Oath of Treachery.

216580.name: Hyakke-Yagyo (百鬼夜行)
boardgamepublisher: ペンとサイコロ (Pen and Dice)
216580.description:
Publisher's summary
妖怪 (Yo-kai) are a class of supernatural monsters, spirits and demons in Japanese folklore. They can also be called ayakashi (妖), mononoke (物の怪) and so on. 妖怪 range eclectically from the malevolent to the mischievous, or occasionally bring good fortune to those who encounter them.

百鬼夜行 (Hyakki Yagyo / Hyakki Yako : Night Parade of a Hundred Demons) is a concept in Japanese folklore. It is a parade which is composed of a hundred kinds of spirits. The game title, 百怪夜行 (Hyakke-Yagyo) combined these two words; "怪" represents "Yo-kai".

Players see or hear about Yo-kai, then make a story and talk about them.
Is that story fact or fiction?
No one can tell....

During each round, players try to play cards down from their hand using certain combinations (e.g. a set of the same number, a line of the same suit).

Each turn, a player can play 1 of 3 actions.
1. Take a card from the open cards (Yokai-Parade zone)
2. Take a card from the discard pile (Gossip zone)
3. Play cards down from their hand.

When a player has disclosed enough cards, they win the round and score a point. The first player to win 10 points wins the game. With 2 players, the target is to get 12 cards down; 9 cards for 3 players and 7 cards for 4 players.

216581.name: Epic Card Game: Uprising – Kark's Edict
216581.description:
Captain Marcus' tyrannical grip on the people of Covenant has sparked an uprising. With the city in chaos, Chamberlain Kark has issued an edict declaring martial law. As the Watch makes scores of arrests, popular support for the uprising grows even stronger. Will justice prevail?

This Kark's Edict pack contains 13 cards for use with Epic Card Game: Chamberlain Kark, Justice Prevails, Martial Law, Mythic Monster, Fires of Rebellion, Spore Beast, Consume, Grave Demon, Winged Death, Citadel Scholar, Fairy Trickster, Night of Elara, and a Human/Demon Token.

216582.name: Epic Card Game: Uprising – Will of Zannos
216582.description:
With the city of Covenant in the midst of a savage uprising, a dark force is growing in the shadows. Zannos, the Corpse Lord, is using the casualties of the conflict to provide more soldiers for his army of plague zombies. Can the will of Zannos be stopped before it is too late?

This Will of Zannos pack contains 13 cards for use with Epic Card Game: Zannos Corpse Lord, Corpsemonger, Plague Zombies, Citadel Raven, Reusable Knowledge, Siren's Song, Avenger of Covenant, Bodyguard, Gladius the Defender, Entangling Vines, Pyrosaur, Savage Uprising, and a Wolf/Zombie token.

216583.name: Epic Card Game: Uprising – Velden's Wrath
216583.description:
The mighty Velden has come from the far north. Has this wrathful titan come to fight the forces of Drakka and demons of Raxxa, or is he just another one of the mysterious Helion's puppets? The fairies say he is the one heralded by the mist guides, and they've rallied to his banner. As his forces come closer to his city of Covenant, the question looms: hero or villain?

This Velden's pack contains 13 cards for use with Epic Card Game: Velden Frost Titan, Erratic Research, Frantic Digging, Angel of the Gate, Rescue Griffin, Village Protector, Den Mother, Flame Spike, Winds of Change, Demonic Rising, Raxxa's Enforcer, Rift Summoner, and a Human/Demon token.

216584.name: Epic Card Game: Uprising – Flames of Scarros
216584.description:
For years, the wilds around the city of Covenant have been terrorized by the mighty Drakka. Now, there are whispers that the tyrannical dragon may have been defeated. This is small comfort to those being burned out of their home by Drakka's possessive hound Scarros.

With each fiery battle, Scarros' power seems to grow. Will someone defeat him before the wilds are consumed in flames?

This Flames of Scarros pack contains 13 cards for use with Epic Card Game: Scarros Hound of Drakka, Hunting Pack, Go Wild, Little Devil, No Escape, Saren Night Stalker, Force Field, Reset, War Machine, Brand Rebel Fighter, Master Zo, Silver Dragon, and a Wolf/Zombie token.

216586.name: Santa is Dead
216586.description:
From publisher blurb:

Father Christmas, Sinterklaas, and Jolly Old St. Nick have been conflated into something new, something uniquely American. Stolen from a myriad of cultures, devoid of anything but ruthless optimism and joy, half remembered bits of Germanic mythos converge into a new being.

Small miracles spawn in the wake of a flying sleigh pulled by reindeer. Small bright bits of kindness, remembering only the giver of winter... forgiving and forgetting the terrible toll of December, the devouring form of midwinter, the savage joy of pursuit, the destroyer, the Hunter...

Such a travesty, this laughing New World oaf.

It cannot be abided.

Wodan Rides.

Santa is Dead is a Old School Renaissance (OSR) adventure filled with holiday dread. It will take to you from the sleepy town Standinstone to Chesnut, a sleepy town where something is definitely amiss.

216587.name: Quizality - Christmas!
216587.description:
User Summary

Quizality - Christmas Edition is a single player multiple choice quiz, set in a Virtual Reality Winter Wonderland.

216588.name: 12 Labours of Hercules VI: Race for Olympus
216588.description:
User Summary

This time, Hercules and Megara are involved in the detective story. Alarm at Olympus is showing the absence of Zeus, who rarely left the peak.

216589.name: Heroine Anthem Zero
216589.description:
Heroine Anthem Zero is a 2D side-scrolling action RPG, the first of the classic Heroine Anthem series to be available overseas. Beginning in 2002, the series has been a pinnacle of storytelling for the Chinese gaming community.

Source: The Game Website.

216591.name: Space Slam
216591.description:
In SPACE SLAM there is only one way to mine: ramming planets at full speed with your spacecraft. View the action in VR with your HTC Vive or in flat mode!

Source: The Developer Website.

216592.name: Mini Golf Resort
216592.description:
User Summary

Customize your character's looks and wardrobe. Discover distinct worlds like Pirate's Bay & Spooky House.

216593.name: Radiantflux: Hyperfractal
216593.description:
Data-fractal hyper structures are the new storage medium favoured by big companies. You are a neo-hacker, a new breed of bedroom fract-breaker, and these data-structures are your playground. After receiving an unusual email instructing you to hack your own homepage you discover a hidden world that will take you through the hack-zone and deep into the dark-web to yield untold riches in lost and forbidden softwares.

Source: The Publisher Website.

216594.name: Ooey Gooey House Guests
216594.description:
From the introduction:

The players seek out the other shards of the Crystal of Juiblex. They journey through the wilderness to the homes of Brinda and Dastrix, who have each suffered the consequences of the Crystal's call in their own way. The players will battle with oozes, struggle through an Ettercap trap, and battle an insane sorcerer to begin grasping the magnitude of Juiblex's curse.

Ooey Gooey House Guests is the third part of a 6-part adventure series designed to take characters from 1st through 4th level.

An adventure for 4-5 3rd level characters.

216595.name: Crypt of the Elven King
216595.description:
From the introduction:

Delve into the depths of the tomb of the long forgotten elven king to bring the eternal peace onto its disturbed dwellers.

A 4-hour adventure for two 4th level characters.

User summary:

Distributed as a 43-page PDF scenario and a ZIP archive containing four JPG map files.

216596.name: The Radlands
216596.description:
A Sandbox Campaign Setting the the Post-Apocalypse

Publisher's blurb:

This is a campaign document which includes all the resources needed to run your very own nuclear wasteland sandbox. It contains a complete region, including mapped settlements, dungeons, and encounter areas.

But what's a sandbox without adventure? A variety of random tables have also been included to make sure the mission board is stays full, and there's always rewards to be had.

216597.description:
Description from the publisher:

Flatline is a co-operative dice game set in the Fuse universe. Players must roll their dice and work to combine them with other players in order to properly treat arriving patients. Every round, players race against a one-minute timer and must deal with the needs of wounded crew members as well as other emergencies within the ER. Time is running out!
216597.name: Flatline: A FUSE Aftershock Game
boardgamepodcastepisode: #45: Six-Player Six Pack; Las Vegas on tap; Barcelona; Mystic Vale; Betrayal at the Brewery on the Hill
Episode 70 - Interview with Renegade Game Studios Scott Gaeta

216599.name: Jorinda's Flight
216599.description:
From the introduction:

This adventure is written for three to five level one characters and meant to introduce new players to the three pillars of a Dungeons & Dragons game: exploration, social interaction and combat. It will take the players around four to five hours to complete the adventure.
...
The adventure takes place in the valley of Burg Neuland in the Grand Duchy of Letzebürg. The small eponymous town lies at the center of the valley. Its four hundred inhabitants live scattered around a large keep. North to the town run the outskirts of the large Märchenwald.

216600.description:
Description from the publisher:

It’s a manufacturing arms race! You compete against other players to see who can build the most efficient set of factories in the shortest amount of time. Players roll their dice, run their factories, and sabotage their way into industrial dominance. Whether you’re pursuing an empire building strategy, assembling a tight factory engine, or training your workers, there are many paths to victory.

In Fantastic Factories, you race to 15 victory points. There are elements of dice rolling, worker placement, engine building, resource management, tableau building, simultaneous play, and some card drafting. Each turn is split into two phases, the day shift and the night shift.

During the day shift, players simultaneously roll their dice and use their dice as workers to build and activate factories. Buildings start as blueprints and need to be constructed. Once constructed, each building can be used once each turn. Worker placement can happen in any order and figuring out the correct order will help you accelerate your engine. Each day shift is like solving a unique worker placement puzzle.

During the night shift, players choose to either acquire a new blueprint from the marketplace or purchase and play an action card. Action cards can be used to reinforce your strategy or disrupt other players' engines. These actions might be as innocent as hiring an extra worker or might be as destructive or sneaky as sabotage or industrial espionage.

Once a player obtains 15 victory points, the game is over and the player with the most victory points wins. With over 50 unique blueprints and countless synergies across buildings, each game is unique. Fantastic Factories offers a lot of replay value and satisfaction as players discover new factory engines with each game.
216600.name: Fantastic Factories

216601.description:
Description from the publisher:

This new expansion set is fully compatible with Mare Nostrum: Empires. Add new Heroes inspired by the Bible with new powers to explore that affect Military, Culture, and Trade!

The set includes 5 characters:

Daniel – Choose one trade good an opponent must trade.

David – Add +1 to land battle die rolls when at a disadvantage.

Jesus – Temples in your province and adjacent opponent provinces do not double Coin Resources.

John the Baptist – Remove an opposing Legion from yours or an adjacent province.

Joshua – Opposing fortresses do not ignore the first hit.
216601.name: Mare Nostrum: Empires – Heroes of the Bible

216602.name: The Bloodied Hooves
216602.description:
From publisher blurb:

A Ponyfinder Campaign for a group of fifth level adventurers with all party sizes from 3 to 7 supported. This module contains enough material for a good number of normal length adventuring sessions and will allow your players to gain two levels as they play through it.

The Bloodied Hooves continues from where events in The Gem Gnoll War left off. You can play this module without playing the others first but you will get the most out of To Found an Empire by playing them through in order. The Kingdom has been peaceful for a few precious years but now new threats are stirring both within and without. Our heroes will need to face many new foes and uncover old mysteries as they attempt to unravel the plots that threaten their home.

216604.name: La Légende de Glendaloch
rpgseries: EKB - Living Greyhawk Ekbir Regional Adventures
216604.description:
A Two-Round Living Greyhawk Ekbir Regional Scenario

From the introduction:

Sur les terres d'Ekbir, dans ce pays que certains nomment Greyhawk, les personnages sont les impuissantes victimes d'une justice aveugle. Au milieu de la tourmente, les héros d'aujourd'hui feront face à ceux d'hier pour que vive, éternelle, la Léegende de Glendaloch.

216605.name: Les Griffes Du Morskmogil
rpgseries: EKB - Living Greyhawk Ekbir Regional Adventures
216605.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Ekbir Regional Scenario

From the introduction:

S'il est bien un endroit où il ne faut pas être lorsque la tempête se lève, c'est en vue des récifs du Morksmogil. Tous le capitaines d'Ekbir savent cela, et celui qui dirige le navire dans lequel se trouvent les aventuriers le sait aussi.

Alors, la tempête se lève...

216606.name: Un Parfum de Rose
rpgseries: EKB - Living Greyhawk Ekbir Regional Adventures
216606.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Ekbir Regional Scenario

From the introduction:

Lorsque que les essences du passé fleurissent au présent, le plus dur est de savoir si le doux parfum qui s'en dégage n'a pas attiré la corruption qui vien souvent flétrit les belles choses. Sur le chemic d'un rêve ancient nos héros sauront-ils éviter les écueils du passé, pour s'enivrer les sens de tant de beautée et de majesté.

Un Parfum de Rose est une aventure Donjons & Dragons pour un groupe de personnage de niveaus 1 à 8.

216607.name: Zif of Porphyra
216607.description:
From publisher blurb:

The Zif- ambitious Snail-Men of the Northern Shores!

The unlikely rise of the zif, evolved from parasites upon the bodies of the invading Great Old Ones millennia ago, is an issue all humanoids on Porphyra should learn, for two-leggers are, perhaps, not the height of development after all…

Living in their shell-city of Barbledrum upon the mad shores of the Sea of Ithreia, in the shadow of the Reversed Lands, on the border of the Purple Membrance, the zif are comfortable and prosperous in conditions that would drive most sentients insane. With their septad system of caste and clan, all zif know their purpose, to spread the power of the zif collective to all corners of the planet- except where it is too dry or boring… Perry Fehr’s Zif of Porphyra, new from Purple Duck Games gives you everything you need to know about this quirky, aberrant race and play them as player characters. Zif of Porphyra includes:

Zif racial characteristics, ecology, traits, and alternative racial characteristics
Favored class bonuses for over 40 classes
4 new racial class archetypes, one for each ambitious caste
10 racial feats, such as learning to master very useful guu!
5 new magic items, and 5 new spells!
Typical zif adventurers and a neat new sample character at 6th level!




So expand your horizons and try the arcane, eldritch mysteries of Zif of Porphyra, snail-men of the Ithreian Sea, from the marvelous molluscs at Purple Duck Games, where our games are what you want!

216608.name: Raft
216608.description:
Survive the harsh life of being stuck on a raft in the middle of the ocean! Gather debris from the water in order to craft equipment necessary for your survival. Expand your raft in order to create a more comfortable living for yourself, but be wary of the dangers of the ocean!

Source: The Game Website.

216609.name: Piégés d'Avance
rpgseries: EKB - Living Greyhawk Ekbir Regional Adventures
216609.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Ekbir Regional Scenario

From the introduction:

« Après s'être rencontrés à l'auberge, les aventuriers ont découvert les mystères du Mausolée hanté et se sont emparés de ses trésors cachés en résolvant l'énigme des quatre éléments. » Voilà qui sonne comme une aventure des plus classiques. Malheureusement ce n'est pas le cas.

Une aventure pour des personnages de niveau 1 à 6.

216610.name: Consumé par son Amour
rpgseries: EKB - Living Greyhawk Ekbir Regional Adventures
216610.description:
A Two-Round Living Greyhawk Ekbir Regional Scenario

From the introduction:

La grande compétition de Kura du festival de Froidenoce approche et la ville d’Ekbir est en pleine ébullition. Une foule imposante se presse dans la ville d’Ekbir ainsi qu’aux alentours et avec elle tous les problèmes que cela engendre. Pourtant nul ne s’attend à ce qu’un marchand très en vue soit la victime d’une créature infernale s’enfuyant au-dessus de la ville après son forfait. La victime laisse derrière lui une veuve apeurée, son affaire et un grand mystère...

Deuxième épisode de la campagne L’Héritage d’Artaxoës.

216611.name: Les Ombres d'Abn Toubkal
rpgseries: EKB - Living Greyhawk Ekbir Regional Adventures
216611.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Ekbir Regional Scenario

From the introduction:

La nuit tombe sur le paisible bois d'Abn Toubkal, tandis que la brume se lève. La rassurante lueur du feu ne parvient pas à faire oublier les silhouettes des arbres décharnés. Même les animaux nocturnes hésitent à troubler le calme apparent, conscients du danger tapis. La brume s'épaissit, étouffant les cris des mourants, un lit de feuilles mortes comme dernière demeure. La forêt s'endort alors que de sombres histoires se réveillent.

216612.name: Le Fugitif
rpgseries: EKB - Living Greyhawk Ekbir Regional Adventures
216612.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Ekbir Regional Scenario

From the introduction:

Les attaques dirigées contre la région du Darboz ont redoublé ces derniers temps. Ce sont tout d’abord les bandits de l’Udgru au service du Chevalier noir qui pillent la campagne et les caravanes. Mais c’est surtout l’attaque massive d’une flotte ataphade contre le port de Bandar-Zyarat qui suscite l’inquiétude. Le Darboz a besoin de renforts. Vous voilà donc en route pour Bandar-Zyarat...

Troisième épisode de la campagne Arcanes d’un autre temps (L’Héritage d’Artaxoës).

Une aventure pour les APL 4 à 10.

216613.name: Pour une poignée d'étoiles
rpgseries: EKB - Living Greyhawk Ekbir Regional Adventures
216613.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Ekbir Regional Scenario

From the introduction:

Parfois, raison et sentiments s’opposent. En Ekbir, les traditions et le respect de la famille sont des valeurs essentielles: peuvent-elles être brisées par amour ? Pour une poignée d’étoiles, les personnages seront-ils les complices d’un crime ou d’un geste d’amour? A travers les terres insulaires de Murenshi, des landes brumeuses au Malvallon, leur quête réservera bien des surprises.

Une aventure pour les APL 2-8.

216614.name: Les Tours naissantes
rpgseries: EKB - Living Greyhawk Ekbir Regional Adventures
216614.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Ekbir Regional Scenario

From the introduction:

Nous ne sommes plus qu’à une quinzaine de jours du festival de chaudenoce et de nombreux marchands et voyageurs issus de la route commerciale se pressent dans les bacs pour traverser la Tuflik. C’est le point de départ d’un périple qui mènera les aventuriers jusque dans l’Udgru à la poursuite d’un songe, d’une tour...

Quatrième épisode de la campagne Arcanes d’un autre temps (L’Héritage d’Artaxoës).

Un scénario pour les APL 4-10.

216616.name: Le Retour de Zuoken
rpgseries: EKB - Living Greyhawk Ekbir Regional Adventures
216616.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Ekbir Regional Scenario

From the introduction:

Un monastère perdu aux confins du Califat d’Ekbir est le théâtre d’inquiétants événements. Les aventuriers sauront-ils percer les mystères de la Dévotion silencieuse?

Une aventure pour les APL 2 à 12.

216617.name: L'Appel du Bassin
rpgseries: EKB - Living Greyhawk Ekbir Regional Adventures
216617.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Ekbir Regional Mini-Adventure

From the introduction:

Bien qu'originaire d'Ekbir, vos pas vous ont mené aux quatre coins du Flanaess. Loin de du Califat vous vous sentez souvent coupé de vos racines, mais il y a un lieu vos compétences sont maintenant reconnues: L'Auberge du Dragon Tortue dans le quartier des étrangers de Greyhawk. L'auberge est une parcelle de territoire bakluni dans un monde étranger, tous les érudits, les marchands et les mercenaires qui transitent par Greyhawk s'y arrêtent au moins pour prendre des nouvelles.

Un étrange message vous y attend...

Pour un groupe de personnage de niveau 3 à 7.

216618.name: The Council of Colbridge
216618.description:
Description from the designer:

On the surface, Colbridge is a thriving medieval city, ruled over by a council of three wise nobles. But beneath the calm façade the council is locked in a deadly battle for mastery. Your reputation for resourcefulness has seen you hired to help elevate one of the councilors by acts of charity, bribery, or violence. The only problem is that the agent who hired you was recently found stabbed under a hedge, and hadn't yet got around to mentioning which of the three councilors is paying you. Can you use your wits to deduce who your patron is and elevate him or her to rule the city?

The Council of Colbridge is based on a unique combination of imperfect information, deduction and constrained action. Each player knows the patron of at least one other player, but not their own. Each turn players select actions (charity, bribery or violence) and how these balance with the previous actions of the other players determines which councillor advances in power. By watching and analysing the actions of others, players may deduce who their patron is and push them to power. But what if someone was bluffing? The resulting atmosphere of calculation and suspicion is reminiscent of a political thriller.

216619.name: Dans l'ombre de la haine
rpgseries: EKB - Living Greyhawk Ekbir Regional Adventures
216619.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Ekbir Regional Adventure

From the introduction:

Le festival du Regain est proche et avec les beaux jours reviennent les compétitions de Kura, de Sibaq al Khaïl et surtout la grande course de chevaux du Trophée des Champions cette année. Mais au-delà des festivités, de bien sombres choses se trament en Ekbir. Des visages comme des noms familiers ressurgissent du passé et c’est une toute autre course que vont devoir effectuer nos héros… Il est recommandé, mais pas indispensable, d’avoir joué l’aventure Consumé par son amour.

Une aventure pour les APLs 2-12.

216620.name: Grand Sourire, Grande Gueule
rpgseries: EKB - Living Greyhawk Ekbir Regional Adventures
216620.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Ekbir Introductory Adventure

From the introduction:

Qu’arrive-t-il lorsqu’un ancien aventurier découvre des secrets du passé avant ceux qui mettent leur vie en jeu pour ces mêmes secrets?

Une aventure d’introduction pour personnages de niveau 1 seulement.

216621.name: Le Chant du tocsin
rpgseries: EKB - Living Greyhawk Ekbir Regional Adventures
216621.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Ekbir Regional Adventure

From the introduction:

Une plume, un songe, une mémoire brisée, et bientôt sonnera le glas...

Cette aventure est la suite du scénario EKB5-01 Dans l'ombre de la haine.

Un scénario pour les APLs 4 -12.

216622.name: Et pour quelques coupes de plus
rpgseries: EKB - Living Greyhawk Ekbir Regional Adventures
216622.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Ekbir Introductory Adventure

From the introduction:

Le grand championnat de Kura se produit dans la capitale. L’occasion d’attirer encore plus de monde que d’habitude. La fête bat son plein. Mais un homme vient de découvrir l’impensable, et veut en tirer partie.

Une aventure d’introduction pour personnages de niveau 1 seulement.

216623.name: La Proie pour l'ombre
rpgseries: EKB - Living Greyhawk Ekbir Regional Adventures
216623.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Ekbir Regional Adventure

From the introduction:

Le village de Médrina n’est plus un village paisible depuis quelques semaines. Une étrange apparition trouble sa tranquillité. Les cavaliers-tonnerre du Dezbat tout proche campent non loin du village. Une ancienne tragédie refait surface.

Cette aventure en Ekbir pour les APLs 2-10 se situe dans la trame des Faris Rautha (ou chevaliers métamorphes).

216624.name: La Légende de Glendaloch
rpgseries: EKB - Living Greyhawk Ekbir Regional Adventures
216624.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Ekbir Introductory Adventure

From the introduction:
