First player to make stomach/balloon pop looses the game.

216739.name: Petrified Plants
216739.description:
From publisher blurb:

Deadly Gardens is a series of short PDF documents that each feature a brand new plant monster to use in your Pathfinder Roleplaying Game or OGL campaigns. In addition to a new monster, each volume will also feature supplemental material based around the natural wilderness theme.

In this volume:

Petrified Plants Template
Petrified Treant CR 11
Petrified Ophidan Vine CR 9
New Terrain Type Stonebriar
New Special Material: Woodstone

216740.name: Czas Zaorać Socjalizm
216740.description:
Czas Zaorać Socjalizm ("It's time to pulverize the socialism") is a mix of the card and the board game that brings players right into the fierce fight between right and left side. It's a game for 2-4 players, each with his own, prepared deck. Game is filled with well known persons of the right and left side of the politics. Players are using their cards to place them on the board and spread their controll and influence.

The game contains 210 cards, some of them picturing well known characters of the Polish politics, like Janusz Korwin-Mikke, Przemysław Wipler, Grzegorz Braun, Marian Kowalski (all of them used under permission) and so on, along with some historical ones, like Lenin or Stalin. Cards are divided into three fractions - left, right and neutral. Each player plays with his own, prepared deck. The idea is to place cards (characters and buildings) on the board, use the event cards to boost the statistics and finally, use them to make other players lose their Life Points (each player has 10 at start).

216742.name: Shark Tank: The Game
216742.description:
Based on the hit reality television show about pitching business ideas to big name investors for a chance to score real success. In this home version, the player with the largest net worth after six company pitches wins!

Players take turns being the Entrepreneur, taking a pitch out of a large deck of theoretical products and selling it to their friends the best they can. Their friends bid, or don't, and if one wins, they get to back the company and get any rewards associated with it. Get bonus money for backing projects that match your investor's area of expertise.

Caveat: The rules say this requires a die, specifically a d3 of colors, but one is not included. Most homes can easily use a d6 and designate two numbers each for the three colors, though.

216743.name: Korsbæk
216743.description:
Compete with friends and family members to become the most succesful successor to Mads Skjern's business empire! A game of trivia questions based on the succesful Television series "Matador".

This game builds on questions previously used in other games with the same theme, but has a new different gaming mechanics:

All players start out with a suitcase with which they travel round the board. Players earn money by answering questions of variating difficulty.

Speciel fields on the game board, allow the players to advance from the suitcase to a small house, eventually reaching the 3 storage warehouse that Mads Skjerns ends with in the television series.

Special cards allow the players to interact by moving the player tokens on the board, stealing money from players etc.

The winner is the first player with a 3 storage warehouse to pass the starting field on the board.

Special questions are available to children playing the game with little or no prerequisites for answering Matador specific questions.

216744.name: Crazy Cereal
216744.description:
Grab a spoon and watch as it magically changes color. Then, dig into the cereal serving bowl and scoop up pieces of that color. Cross your fingers for a color flash free-for-all! Collect the most cereal pieces and you win! (From the box)

Crazy Cereal is a children's game for 2 players. Each player gets a spoon which when turned on, lights up with one of 4 colors. Players try to scoop cereal pieces in the color matching their spoon's light as it changes, one piece at a time. When a spoon starts flashing, that player gets a "free-for-all" and must scoop 2 pieces of a time in any color. Players can also scoop orange colored pieces which are only available during a "free-for-all".

The player with the most cereal pieces in their bowl when the serving bowl is empty is the winner.

216745.name: Lotus Game
216745.description:
A humorous Parscheesi-like game produced by the Lotus Development Corporation in 1987, with a tongue-in-cheek nod to tech office life and many behind-the-scenes happenings during the company's heyday.

Description from the publisher:
The purpose of the Lotus Game is to ship and sell product around the world by obtaining approval from the 4 corresponding departments of manufacturing, finance, research and development, and marketing/sales. Along the way, you will encounter everything from Lotus celebrations to Lotus mishaps. You may find yourself phone-mailed or e-emailed away to meetings. And beware of reorgs that can change everyone's status in the game.

216746.name: Wiedersehen im Adri
rpgseries: AHL - Living Greyhawk Ahlissa (Adri/Innspa) Regional Adventures
216746.description:
A Living Greyhawk Regional Adventure

From the introduction:

Eine Expedition zu einer alten Tempelanlage bringt die Spielerfiguren auf die Spur diverser Geschehnisse im Adri-Wald - und ein uraltes Geheimnis beginnt sich zu enthüllen...

Ein Abenteuer für neue Spielercharaktere im Adri-Wald nach den Regeln der D&D-Drittauflage für Charaktere der Stufen 1-4.

216747.name: Unheil über Sicherwald
rpgseries: AHL - Living Greyhawk Ahlissa (Adri/Innspa) Regional Adventures
216747.description:
A Living Greyhawk Regional Adventure

From the introduction:

Mitten im Adri liegt das Fort Sicherwald. Doch kaum seid ihr angekommen, wird es auch schon angegriffen. Als wenig später dann noch einige Krankheitsfälle auftreten, glaubt niemand mehr an einen Zufall...

Ein Abenteuer im Adri-Wald nach den Regeln von D&D 3.5 ausschließlich für neue Spielercharaktere der Stufe 1.

216748.name: Mord im Badehaus
rpgseries: AHL - Living Greyhawk Ahlissa (Adri/Innspa) Regional Adventures
216748.description:
A Living Greyhawk Regional Adventure

From the introduction:

Der reiche Händler Arkens Disanjo wird mitten in der Öffentlichkeit im Badehaus ermordet - gleichsam erlegt von einem wilden Tier! Und das mitten in Herbergsbad! Was geht hier vor? Wer hasste den Kaufmann so sehr, dass er ihn auf diese ungewöhnliche Art und Weise umbrachte? Und was hat der Gnomenaquädukt mit all dem zu tun?

Die Badehäuser von Herbergsbad – Teil 1.

Ein Abenteuer in der Stadt Herbergsbad nach den Regeln von D&D 3.5, ausschließlich für neue Spielercharaktere der Stufe 1.

216749.name: Banditen des Adri
rpgseries: AHL - Living Greyhawk Ahlissa (Adri/Innspa) Regional Adventures
216749.description:
A Living Greyhawk Regional Adventure

From the introduction:

Banditen machen seit einiger Zeit die Handelsstraße nach Alfersfurt unsicher. Nach langen Jahren der Isolation ist der rt aber auf den Handel angewiesen. Wer steckt hinter diesen Überfällen? Und was bezweckt er mit ihnen?

in Einführungsabenteuer ausschließlich für Charaktere der Stufe 1 (DGS 2).

216750.name: Totentanz
rpgseries: AHL - Living Greyhawk Ahlissa (Adri/Innspa) Regional Adventures
216750.description:
Ein einründiges Living Greyhawk Herbergsbad/Adri-Einführungsabenteuer

From the introduction:

Unirdische Musik erschallt zwischen den Feuersteinhügeln in den westlichen Ausläufern des Adris. Menschen verschwinden auf Nimmerwiedersehen aus ihren Dörfern. Gibt es einen Zusammenhang mit den riesigen Wesen, die in dieser Gegend beobachtet wurden?

Für 4-6 Charaktere der Stufe 1 (Durchschnittliche Gruppenstufe (DGS) 1-2), nach den Regeln von D&D 3.5.

216751.name: Der lachende Weinberg
rpgseries: AHL - Living Greyhawk Ahlissa (Adri/Innspa) Regional Adventures
216751.description:
Ein Abenteuer für Living Greyhawk

From the introduction:

In einem der Weinberge, die man in der Nähe der Stadt Herbergsbad finden kann, werden seit einigen Tagen nach Einbruch der Dunkelheit merkwürdige Geräusche vernommen. Und am Morgen finden die Arbeiter verwüstete Rebstöcke. Bald steht die Lese an und der Winzer befürchtet, dass die abergläubischen Arbeiter sich verweigern werden und die Reben an den Stöcken verfaulen müssen. Dies scheint genau die richtige Aufgabe zu sein, um zu beweisen, was ihr könnt...

Ein Abenteuer im Fürstentum
Herbergsbad nach den Regeln von D&D 3.5 ausschließlich für neue Spielercharaktere der Stufe 1.

216752.name: Rätselhafter Adri - Nebeltor
rpgseries: AHL - Living Greyhawk Ahlissa (Adri/Innspa) Regional Adventures
216752.description:
Ein Abenteuer für Living Greyhawk

From the introduction:

Auf einen rätselhaften Hinweis hin begeben sich die Charakter tiefer in den Adri und entdecken, dass dort mehr Geheimnisse schlummern als sie dachten. Abseits der Straßen und Wege, die durch den helleren, freundlichen Teil des Adri führen, kommen sie durch finstere Gebiete im Wald und an den Rand eines verwunschenen Orts, an dem sie eine Ahnung von der langen Geschichte des großen Walds erheischen können. Vielleicht können sie verhindern, dass eine vermeintlich für immer gebannte Gefahr aufs Neue erwacht und so Freunde gewinnen, von denen sie nie wussten und eine eigene Seite in der Geschichte des Adri beanspruchen...

Geschrieben für DGS 2-10.

216753.name: The Queen and Shoe Makers
216753.description: In The Queen and Shoe Makers, players are challenged to combine upper cards and heel cards to make nice-looking shoes for the Queen.

216754.name: Dark Wings Over Downslope
rpgseries: AHL - Living Greyhawk Ahlissa (Adri/Innspa) Regional Adventures
216754.description:
A Living Greyhawk Ahlissa (Innspa) Regional Special Mission

From the introduction:

Though it would be nice to have time to stay in the pleasurable city of Innspa, the Adri Forest is calling you. The peaceful forest village of Downslope needs your help once again. With the terrain you are heading for, perhaps it's best to leave the mounts in the stables. And you had better gear up on those healing potions... this might get nasty.

A special mission for adventurers of levels 2 to 12.

216755.name: In Deepest Oerth
rpgseries: AHL - Living Greyhawk Ahlissa (Adri/Innspa) Regional Adventures
216755.description:
A Three-Round Special Event for Living Greyhawk

From the introduction:

A short time ago, a group of daring adventurers, hired by the church of Rao in Innspa, managed to salvage an ancient tome dedicated to the faith of Nerull. The book not only details complicated rituals, but also describes star constellations and specifies places in the Adri that are strongly imbued with magic.

216756.name: Die Schlange im Gras
rpgseries: AHL - Living Greyhawk Ahlissa (Adri/Innspa) Regional Adventures
216756.description:
Anpassungshinweise an die Region Herbergsbad / Adri-Markland

User summary:

This concise document provides guidance to Dungeon Masters for the process of utilizing an "Adaptable" scenario for the Ahlissa (Adri/Innspa) region: ADP1-06: A Snake in the Grass.

216757.name: Ein Ausflug am Nachmittag
rpgseries: AHL - Living Greyhawk Ahlissa (Adri/Innspa) Regional Adventures
216757.description:
Anpassungshinweise an die Region Herbergsbad / Adri-Markland

User summary:

This concise document provides guidance to Dungeon Masters for the process of utilizing an "Adaptable" scenario for the Ahlissa (Adri/Innspa) region: ADP1-07a: An Afternoon Outing (Round 1) and ADP1-07b: An Afternoon Outing (Round 2).

216758.name: Ooops!
216758.description:
The Fun Family Race Game!

In Ooops!, players attempt to move their pawns from Start to Home in this Pachisi / Sorry! type game. Movement is determined by turning over a card from the draw pile, then following the instructions shown on the card.

Some of the main differences between Ooops! and Sorry! are:

Ooops! cards: Take one pawn from start and switch places with an opponent, bumping them back to their start OR move one pawn forward four spaces.
The "11" card: Move one pawn forward 11 spaces or switch places with any opponent.




Aside from those differences, gameplay nearly exactly the same.

216759.name: Der Festritter
rpgseries: AHL - Living Greyhawk Ahlissa (Adri/Innspa) Regional Adventures
216759.description:
Anpassungshinweise an die Region Herbergsbad / Adri-Markland

User summary:

This concise document provides guidance to Dungeon Masters for the process of utilizing an "Adaptable" scenario for the Ahlissa (Adri/Innspa) region: ADP1-05: Festival Knight.

216760.name: Der letzte Weg
rpgseries: AHL - Living Greyhawk Ahlissa (Adri/Innspa) Regional Adventures
216760.description:
A Living Greyhawk Regional Adventure

From the introduction:

Caleb, einer der berüchtigtsten Verbrecher des Adri, und seine Bande Halsabschneider sind in die Wälder um Herbergsbad zurückgekehrt. Doch sie sind nicht gekommen um abermals zu morden. Was suchen sie hier und wer ist er, der ihnen schon seit geraumer Zeit auf den Fersen ist? Und was hat das alles mit jenem einsamen Gasthaus in den Feuersteinhügeln zu tun?

Dieses Abenteuer ist für alle Charakterklassen und Rassen der Erfahrungsstufen 1-8 (Durchschnittliche Gruppenstufe 2-6) geeignet.

216761.name: Tod im Adri
rpgseries: AHL - Living Greyhawk Ahlissa (Adri/Innspa) Regional Adventures
216761.description:
Ein 2-ründiges Spezial- Abenteuer im Fürstentum Herbergsbad und Adri-Markland

From the introduction:

Versprengte Truppen von Prinz Molil sind desertiert und haben sich im Adri versteckt. Sie wollen die ganze Konfusion nutzen, um auf die Schnelle die spärlich bewachten Dörfer auszurauben und dann so schnell wie möglich diese Gegend zu verlassen und mit der Beute dann ein neues, sorgenfreies Leben irgendwo anders aufzubauen.

User summary:

In addition to the 32-page PDF scenario, a 3-page DOC "variant" was provided: it make several optional revisions to the play structure of the adventure.

216762.name: Die Stimme aus dem Grab
rpgseries: AHL - Living Greyhawk Ahlissa (Adri/Innspa) Regional Adventures
216762.description:
Anpassungshinweise an die Region Herbergsbad / Adri-Markland

User summary:

This concise document provides guidance to Dungeon Masters for the process of utilizing an "Adaptable" scenario for the Ahlissa (Adri/Innspa) region: ADP1-08: A Plea From Beyond the Grave.

216763.name: Der letzte Weg
rpgseries: AHL - Living Greyhawk Ahlissa (Adri/Innspa) Regional Adventures
216763.description:
A Living Greyhawk Regional Adventure

From the introduction:

Caleb, einer der berüchtigtsten Verbrecher des Adri, und seine Bande Halsabschneider sind in die Wälder um Herbergsbad zurückgekehrt. Doch sie sind nicht gekommen um abermals zu morden. Was suchen sie hier und wer ist er, der ihnen schon seit geraumer Zeit auf den Fersen ist? Und was hat das alles mit jenem einsamen Gasthaus in den Feuersteinhügeln zu tun?

Dieses Abenteuer ist für alle Charakterklassen und Rassen der Erfahrungsstufen 1-8 (Durchschnittliche Gruppenstufe 2-6) geeignet.

216764.name: Adri Fiend Follies
rpgseries: AHL - Living Greyhawk Ahlissa (Adri/Innspa) Regional Adventures
216764.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Ahlissa (Innspa) Regional Adventure

From the introduction:

When news of an ancient tower somewhere in the Flinty Hills spread about Innspa, you took an old man's advice and tried a different route. Now you’re where the Flinty Hills meet the Adri Forest and there is smoke over the next rise, but no tower.

Part One of the Elementary Nature Series.

A Tale of faith, divine power and the great outdoors.

An adventure for APLs 2-6.

User summary:

In addition to the 21-page scenario, a 1-page document with print-and-play counters (paper minis) and a 1-page document with German-language player handouts were provided.

216765.name: Aufruhr im Adri
rpgseries: AHL - Living Greyhawk Ahlissa (Adri/Innspa) Regional Adventures
216765.description:
A Living Greyhawk Regional Adventure

From the introduction:

Unerhörte Dinge ereignen sich im Adri. Kreaturen des Waldes fallen unheimlichen Feinden zum Opfer, und selbst die mächtigen Baumhirten scheinen machtlos. Ist der seit über zwei Jahren schwelende Konflikt der beiden Druidinnen in eine "heiße" Phase getreten? Doch warum greifen sie ihre eigene Lebensgrundlage an? Oder steckt mehr dahinter?

Dieses Abenteuer ist für alle Charakterklassen und Rassen der Erfahrungsstufen 1-8 (Durchschnittliche Gruppenstufe 2-8) geeignet.

216766.name: Indigo
rpgseries: AHL - Living Greyhawk Ahlissa (Adri/Innspa) Regional Adventures
216766.description:
A Living Greyhawk Regional Adventure

From the introduction:

Seltsame Dinge gehen vor sich in Herbergsbad. Ein einsamer Rächer ist unterwegs in der Stadt, gnadenlos auf der Spur von Übeltätern und doch außerhalb des Gesetzes. Doch warum hinterlässt er Symbole des Pholtus, wo doch der Pholtus-Tempel nichts von ihm weiß? Und warum ist er.... blau?

Dieses Abenteuer ist für alle Charakterklassen und Rassen der Erfahrungsstufen 1-10 (Durchschnittliche Gruppenstufe 2-10) geeignet.

216767.name: Das gnomische Badehaus
rpgseries: AHL - Living Greyhawk Ahlissa (Adri/Innspa) Regional Adventures
216767.description:
Ein einründiges Living Greyhawk Herbergsbad / Adri-Regionalabenteuer

From the introduction:

Die Gnome von Herbergsbad haben eine neue Beschäftigung entdeckt: das Bauen von Badehäusern! Ausgestattet mit dem letzten Schrei gnomischer Technologie, öffnet das Blubbernde und dampfende gnomische Wunder-Badehaus seine Pforten. Und ihr seid dabei – noch dazu als Ehrengäste aufgrund eurer Verdienste um die Stadt! Ganz Herbergsbad ist aufgeregt. Na, ob das 'mal gut geht...?

Für Charaktere der Stufen 3-8 (Durchschnittliche Gruppenstufe (DGS) 4-8).

216768.name: Verseuchte Träume
rpgseries: AHL - Living Greyhawk Ahlissa (Adri/Innspa) Regional Adventures
216768.description:
Ein einründiges Living Greyhawk Herbergsbad / Adri-Regionalabenteuer

From the introduction:

KURZBESCHREIBUNG. In Jennden gibt es viele Gerüchte darüber, dass auf dem Weg nach Herbergsbad in der letzten Zeit weit mehr Reisegruppen verloren gehen als üblich. Auch ist davon die Rede, dass über dem Wald bei Hügelstolz unheilige Lichter über dem Adri aufblitzen. Die Einwohner von Jennden setzen ihre Hoffnung darauf, dass jemand es wagt der Sache auf den Grund zu gehen.

Für Charaktere der Stufen 2-11 (Durchschnittliche Gruppenstufe (DGS) 4-10).

216769.name: Bierselig
rpgseries: AHL - Living Greyhawk Ahlissa (Adri/Innspa) Regional Adventures
216769.description:
Ein einründiges Living Greyhawk Herbergsbad / Adri-Regionalabenteuer

From the introduction:

Aufregung in Herbergsbad: Die Zilchuskirche will die Einweihung ihrer ganz neuen Tavernenkette mit einer spektakulären Feier begehen. Sogar eigens gebrautes Wentabier soll in Mengen strömen, alles ist geschmückt und die Gäste sind auch schon geladen. Dann kann das Fest ja beginnen, oder?

Für Charaktere der Stufen 1 bis 11 (Durchschnittliche Gruppenstufe (DGS) 2-10).

216770.name: Totentanz
rpgseries: AHL - Living Greyhawk Ahlissa (Adri/Innspa) Regional Adventures
216770.description:
Ein einründiges Living Greyhawk Herbergsbad / Adri-Regionalabenteuer

From the introduction:

Unirdische Musik erschallt zwischen den Feuersteinhügeln in den westlichen Ausläufern des Adris. Menschen verschwinden auf Nimmerwiedersehen aus ihren Dörfern. Gibt es einen Zusammenhang mit den riesigen Wesen, die in dieser Gegend beobachtet wurden?

Für Charaktere der Stufen 1-12 (Durchschnittliche Gruppenstufe (DGS) 2-10).

216771.name: Höllenfeuer
rpgseries: AHL - Living Greyhawk Ahlissa (Adri/Innspa) Regional Adventures
216771.description:
Ein einründiges Living Greyhawk Herbergsbad / Adri-Regionalabenteuer

From the introduction:

Die Seuche ist überwunden, und die Aufräumarbeiten haben begonnen in Herbergsbad. Doch wer trachtet nun einem der Helden der gerade überwundenen Tragödie nach dem Leben? Handelt es sich schon wieder um ein neues Übel, das sich in der Stadt eingenistet hat? Oder eher um ein Gespenst aus der Vergangenheit? Und was hat der Tempel des Pholtus damit zu tun?

Für Charaktere der Stufen 3-14 (Durchschnittliche Gruppenstufe (DGS) 4-12).

216772.name: FeenCON Special Handout
216772.description:
User summary:

This document provides special directions and possible unique outcomes for AHL5-01: Totentanz and AHL5-02: Höllenfeuer. These options and outcomes were available only for characters that played in the adventures at FeenCon 2005.

216773.name: Das Hügelgrab
rpgseries: AHL - Living Greyhawk Ahlissa (Adri/Innspa) Regional Adventures
216773.description:
Ein zweiründiges Living Greyhawk Herbergsbad / Adri-Regionalabenteuer

From the introduction:

Zwei Tage – in dieser Spanne muss es gelingen, das Buch des Nerull aus einer Finsternis zu bergen, die 100 Jahre unangetastet blieb. Uralte Schrecken lauern in unheiligen Hallen und wenn die Zeit abgelaufen ist, wenn sich das Tor wieder schließt, wird es all die Frevler begraben, die es wagten, den Fürst der Toten herauszufordern...

Für Charaktere der Stufen 1 bis 11 (Durchschnittliche Gruppenstufe (DGS) 2-10).

216774.name: Der Grimme Schnitter der verlorenen Seelen
rpgseries: AHL - Living Greyhawk Ahlissa (Adri/Innspa) Regional Adventures
216774.description:
Ein einründiges Living Greyhawk Herbergsbad / Adri-Regionalabenteuer

From the introduction:

Fürchterliche Dinge ereignen sich im Adri. Es häufen sich Berichte über den Anstieg von Untotenangriffen im Adri. Hartnäckigen Gerüchten zufolge, wurde eine Untotenarmee ausgehoben, um gegen die größten Ansiedlungen des Waldes zu marschieren und diese zu erobern. Stecken mächtige Untote hinter dem Ganzen? Oder hat sich in der Abgeschiedenheit des Innerwaldes unauffällig ein geheimer Kult von mächtigen Nekromanten ausgebreitet?

Für Charaktere der Stufen 5-16 (DGS 6-14).

User summary:

The 50-page adventure later received a 2-page "Errata V1.1" addition.

216775.name: Das Schwarze Albino−Schaf
rpgseries: AHL - Living Greyhawk Ahlissa (Adri/Innspa) Regional Adventures
216775.description:
Ein einründiges Living Greyhawk Herbergsbad / Adri-Regionalabenteuer

From the introduction:

Gerüchte machen in Herbergsbad die Runde: Vom Süden sollen mehrere Barken die Harfe mit Ziel auf Nannonshaven herauf kommen. Das flussfahrende Volk ruft seit jeher Misstrauen und Vorurteile selbst bei den sonst als weltoffen geltenden Bürgern Herbergsbads hervor. Ein wandernder Diener des Fharlanghn der gerade aus Jennden kam, will etwas Seltsames beobachtet haben: An Bord eines der Hausboote lebt ein junger Bursche, der wegen seines Äußeren kaum ein Rhennee sein kann. Sicher kann man mehr herausfinden, wenn die Rhennee in Nannonshaven anlegen werden.

Teil 1 der Erste-Schritte-Reihe.

Für Charaktere der Stufen 1-10 (Durchschnittliche Gruppenstufe (DGS) 2-8).

User summary:

The 30-page PDF adventure was supported with a 6-page PDF of images.

216776.name: Ein einfacher Auftrag
rpgseries: AHL - Living Greyhawk Ahlissa (Adri/Innspa) Regional Adventures
216776.description:
Ein einründiges Living Greyhawk Herbergsbad / Adri-Regionalabenteuer

From the introduction:

Mit Dank an Alexandra Velten wegen wichtiger Tipps zum Verhalten von Katzen, Stefan Reschke, Nenad Petrovic und Robert Nickmann wegen Hilfe bei den Spieldaten sowie Katja und Robert Nickmann wegen der Beschreibung und des Plans der Kanalisation von Herbergsbad.

Endlich einmal ein ruhiger Tag in Herbergsbad. Natürlich kommt wieder etwas dazwischen, aber es klingt nach kaum mehr als einer kurzen Ablenkung, schnell zwischen zwei Mahlzeiten erledigt. Dann aber trefft ihr einen legendären Helden, und es scheint, als habe er einige Schatten aus der Vergangenheit im Schlepptau - und Ereignisse, von denen ihr bestenfalls aus Erzählungen gestandener Helden der Stadt wisst, beginnen euch einzuholen...

Für Charaktere der Stufen 1-8 (Durchschnittliche Gruppenstufe (DGS) 2-6).

216777.name: Harfenspiel
rpgseries: AHL - Living Greyhawk Ahlissa (Adri/Innspa) Regional Adventures
216777.description:
Ein einründiges Living Greyhawk Herbergsbad / Adri-Regionalabenteuer

From the introduction:

Kaum ein Händler wagt die Schiffroute den Harfe Fluss hinauf nach Herbergsbad. Seitdem sich zwei Nationen nervös entlang der Harfe belauern, bevorzugen Händler das kalkulierte Risiko einer Überlandreise: weit weg von launischen Grenzwachen oder Gesetzlosen, die das Niemandsland nutzen, um sich vor den Autoritäten zu verstecken. Jetzt wagt ein Schiff erstmals wieder den Versuch, auch wenn einige damit überhaupt nicht einverstanden sind.

Für Charaktere der Stufen 1-8 (Durchschnittliche Gruppenstufe (DGS) 2-6).

User summary:

The 31-page PDF scenario was supported with a 2-page PDF print-and-play map document.

216778.name: Ein vergessener Tempel
rpgseries: AHL - Living Greyhawk Ahlissa (Adri/Innspa) Regional Adventures
216778.description:
Ein Living Greyhawk Herbergsbad/Adri Regional Abenteuer

From the introduction:

Seit Jahren gibt es Hinweise auf einen untergegangen Drachenkult und einen Ring großer Tempel in den Tiefen des Adri, doch niemand wusste bisher, wo diese Tempel zu suchen sind. Nun versuchen verschiedene Parteien (unter anderem die Kirche des Heironeous, die Drachenjünger aber auch der zurückgezogen lebende Magier Olafsdottir) Expeditionen zu entsenden, die einen dieser Tempel finden und die Geheimnisse des Drachenkults der dunklen Vergangenheit entreißen sollen...
...
Für Charaktere der Stufen 3-16 (Durchschnittliche Gruppenstufe (DGS) 4-14).

User summary:

The 34-page PDF (German) scenario was supported with an 8-page (English) print-and-play document (player handouts) and a 16-page print-and-play document of maps and illustrations.

216779.name: A Fudge Tale: Gloombane Manor
216779.description:
From the introduction:

Welcome to the Gloombane Manor adventure, a standalone quest for any fantasy based campaign or single play through.
...
The manor of Gloombane looms over the small village of Breezewood. Primarily a self-sufficient town, they sometimes get traders passing through on their way towards the Forlorn Mountains. Lately, though, the city has faced an unprecedented challenge.

216780.name: The Many Mini-Dungeons of Dungeon Land Handbook
216780.description:
Publisher's blurb:

This collection of horrifying dungeons used almost every idea we could coax out of the legendary creatures that have become so iconic for D&D. Every dungeon has been painstakingly crafted from ancient legends and familiar tales with a fantastic, yet sadisctic twist.

This work comes with 11 full dungeons, each fully furnished with character, NPCs, treaure, maps, and no shortage of the most devious, evil puzzles we could have come up with. These dungeons are fit for the most experienced, tried adventurers and will delight and terrify them.

Each dungeon is unique, flavorful, and many contain items and creatures that have been created just for them. The Mini-Dungeons also contain some familiar and iconic foes.

216781.name: Happy Birthday Party Game
216781.description:
Description from the back of the box:

"Anytime is party time in this delightful game of birthday surprises! Each player selects a character piece, choosing betweeen a doll, a jack-in-the-box, a tin soldier and a stuffed bear. Players then take turns spinning the spinner and moving their character piece around the colourful board. Colour recognition and memory skills are featured. No reading required to play!"

"Object: to be the first player to collect all four pieces of one birthday cake and one of each of the four different party treats.

216782.name: Drink & Beat
216782.description:
The game crafting beermats for lovers of good beer. In the game teams compete magical characters who are strong, but not on the battlefield, and in the tavern for a drink.

The goal - to collect more mugs of beer than your opponent. Beermat has two sides, on which the images are identical, except background (swords or axes). Before the game, the opponents choose background team for which to play. Players take turns beermat spread on the table, trying to flip the enemy's beermat. On each of the four edges of the beermats have a figure, it shows the power of character to this edge. When a player puts a character next to another, it compares the figures for the contiguous edges. If the power is laid out the character more the enemy, character is flip into a our team player. The player always puts his background beermats up. If at the end of the course one of the players from the field lined beermats 3x3, the game ends. Players count the points and determine the winner. Each character have the icon beer mugs in the lower left corner . For every mug of beer at the bottom left icon on beermat in his team, the player gets points. Mugs of it image is a points will the character of his team, on whose side he would. Different mug can bring a different number of points.

216784.description:
A book containing more than 2,500 questions and answers in the six standard Trivial Pursuit categories:


Geography
Entertainment
History
Arts & Literature
Science & Nature
Sports & Leisure


The format is similar to the question cards of a standard Trivial Pursuit game, with six questions on one page and the answers on the backside of that page.

It can be used as an expansion for any Trivial Pursuit set or played on its own.
216784.name: The Ultimate Trivial Pursuit Question & Answer Book

216786.name: Zwei Doofe ein Gedanke
216786.description:
An animal at a zoo? A song from ABBA? A TV moderator? A pirat? Something which is used a little bit too long willingly?
What do you think the others will answer?

Zwei Doofe ein Gedanke is a trivia/word game with a high fun factor. In this game every player tries to give the same answer as the other players, the more the merrier. You will get as many points as players give the same answer.

In one turn, the current player reads the question out loud and let every player think about the answer for a short time. Then he counts back '3, 2, 1...' and then all players will give an answer instantly and simultaniously. Prepare yourself for a lot of fun, complete wrong appreciations and lots of funny answers.

Zwei Doofe ein Gedanke is a crazy, fast and funny game with 440 categories. An ideal gift and souvenir for any opportunity, funny partys and convivial evenings.

216787.name: Spasim
216787.description:
Spasim (abbreviation of "space simulation") was a 32-player 3D networked computer game by Jim Bowery involving 4 planetary systems with up to 8 players per planetary system, released in March 1, 1974. Jim Bowery claims that it is the very first 3D multiplayer game and has offered reward of US $500 to anyone who could document an example of a multiplayer 3D virtual reality game prior to Spasim. In Spasim the players flew around in space and to each other as they appeared as wire-frame space ships. Their positions were updated about every second. The game was played on the PLATO computer system.

Source: Wikipedia, "[en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Spasim Spasim]", available under the CC-BY-SA License.

216789.name: GoRoGo
216789.description:
Publisher's summary
GoRoGo is new Go variant game for two players played with each 10 ordinary black and white pieces and 5 additional neutral ones. Each player has two of the neutral pieces, and one starts on the game board.

Like Go, the game is played on a grid, but the board has only a 5x5 grid with 25 intersections and 40 paths. The purpose of the game is to obtain more of your opponent's pieces, not to claim an area majority.

Since there are only 25 pieces, the game is over after 24 moves at most. A player cannot pass, nor play a neutral piece last. If they don't have a legal move, they lose.

The neutral pieces are both black and white. That is, on Black's turn, a neutral piece is a black piece. Then on White's turn, it is a white piece. This allows moves that are normally prohibited in Go, such as 'Kou'. A player can attack into an area that in Go would be protected.

GoRoGo is a GO game but not GO. It means that the tactics are GO tactics but the strategy isn't GO.

216790.description:
User summary
マッシヴ!Attack of the Tyrant (MASSIVE! Attack of the Tyrant) is a game of a battle between two monsters as seen in monster films like Godzilla and Gamera. Players control their own monster to defeat their opponent. No tricks are needed. Just slam it, kick it, and blow it away!

Players take five parts-cards of their monster. Cards represent their body parts: two arms, two legs, and body. They place these parts to form their monsters.

Each turn, you draw an action card, or when you think it's the time to act, you play any number of action cards to approach and attack your opponent at once.

Whenever you move or attack, the physical position of the parts-cards is important.

Walk: Move one of your legs by one step. You may rotate your leg in any direction as long as both of your leg cards touch at an appropriate point (do not overlap your leg cards). Adjust your body and arms accordingly.

Dash: Walk twice.

Punch: Place an area-of-effect card from one of your arms. If the card touches the opponent's body, the body is pushed back, and if this cause the body to be detached from its legs, the opponent loses its balance and falls prone.

Kick: Same as punch, except that an area-of-effect card is placed from one of your legs.

By combining action cards, you may make a super attack such as slam, stomp, and smash.

You win the game if your opponent falls prone three times.

Publisher's summary
男子なら誰しもが経験したであろう怪獣ソフビやアクションフィギュアでのごっこ遊び、ブンドド…
そのブンドドを完全再現したテーブルゲームが、このマッシヴ！シリーズです。
ゴジラやガメラといった怪獣映画でお馴染みの巨大怪獣同士の喧嘩をイメージし、「殴れ、蹴飛ばせ、吹っ飛ばせ！！」をテーマにした、これまでのボードゲームの常識を覆す、全く新しいプレイ感覚のゲームです。
216790.name: MASSIVE! Attack of the Tyrant (マッシヴ!Attack of the Tyrant)

216791.name: Total War Cards: Punic Wars
216791.description:
Total War Cards: Punic Wars is a two-player card game which takes place in the ancient Punic Wars between Rome and Carthage.

Gameplay: Both players pick an army and fight over different regions to gain score cards for the end of the game. Every turn you can overpower your opponent in a region by placing better army cards than him or gain distinct bonuses by advancing through the technology tree to gain an edge.

Winning the game: Points are scored according to the combinations of Territory each player captures. After six turns of play, the scores are added up, and a winner declared.

The game features a little bit of strategy, bluffing, foresightedness and luck and is very simple to play with children.

216792.name: Barnstormer
216792.description:
Includes 6 different colored shooting marbles of 1" glass (one per player) and one straight block of wood with 5 arches one next to the other.

Place the wooden arches on a flat surface a distance away from the players, based on player skill. Each player takes turns shooting their marble towards the arches, from the same spot and distance away. Marbles that make it through an arch earn points based on the value marked on the the top of the arch.

A player with more skill can take a 'handicap' by shooting from further away.

The first player to 50 points wins.

216793.name: Race to the Depths
216793.description:
From the introduction:

A newly erupted volcano exposes an ancient temple to a world that has forgotten it. Race to the Depths will pit players against other groups of adventurers and treasure seekers to recover plunder from this crumbling edifice.

User summary:

For 4th level characters.

216794.name: Pokémon TCG: Diamond & Pearl
216794.description:
This theme deck Includes:
1 60 card Pokemon deck
1 metallic coin
1 rulebook/card list
1 playmat
1 sheet of damage counters
1 Deck box

216795.name: Racial Presige: Noble Aspirant
216795.description:
From the introduction:

For the drow, power is not earned through trial and hardship. Power is a birthright. But even among the drow, power is a hierarchical beast. Those born into the upper class of drow society possess not only the material excess and social influence that characterizes aristocracy across most races, but also a suit of physical and magical powers that far exceeds that of ordinary drow. Using these powers as a sign of divine favor or a cosmic mandate to rule over others with both iron fist and cruel intent, drow nobles lord over both the lesser races and their poorly endowed kin, commanding drow society both from the shadows and in plain view. In effect, there is a glass ceiling for most drow in their society, a point of no return where a drow can no longer hope to amass the dark power that she craves, a limit not in personal power or ambition, but in birth.

216796.name: Microsized Adventures (Revised)
216796.description:
From the introduction:

Cut your players down to size with Microsized Adventures, by Everyman Gaming, LLC. Designed for the Pathfinder Roleplaying Game, Microsized Adventures gives GMs and players alike the tools they need to create adventures and campaigns from an ant’s point of view, whether the PCs want to mount an ant, scale a dog, or boldly flee from a lumbering toddler.

Microsized Adventures includes:


Rules for altering ordinary-sized creatures in size, transforming them into miniscule Microsized Characters or massive Macrosized Characters.
Rules for adjusting ordinary-sized pests and creatures into mighty threats.
Rules for adjusting combat to accommodate extremely small or extremely large creatures, such as by altering the amount of space conveyed by a square on the combat grid or determining how tiny creatures can make attacks of opportunity, flank, and more.
Two new combat maneuvers that anyone can use, the crush maneuver, which allows large creatures to stomp smaller foes flat, and the scale maneuver, which allows tiny creatures to climb up larger enemies in order to find the perfect vantage point from which to strike.
New archetypes and class options that utilize the new rules found in Microsized Adventures.
New artifacts, cursed items, and intelligent items that can act as the catalyst to a Microsized Adventure.


User summary:

This is a revised and expanded version of Microsized Adventures, with new cover art and layout.

216797.name: Gridiron Football: The Realistic Football Card Game
216797.description: This is a simple, luck-based game designed to simulate the play of American football. Using a deck of 78 cards, players select from among eight play types, including special teams options, then turn over the topmost card to determine the result. Two plays through the deck constitute a complete game. In addition to the card deck, the game contains a rules pamphlet and a pegboard for marking field position, down, and distance to go for a first down.

216798.name: Telestrations: 6 Player Family Pack
216798.description:
This is the family sized (4-6) player version of Telestrations. Gameplay alternates between drawing an image based on your given word, or guessing a word based on the image you've been given. The humor starts to come out when people misinterpret what they had, and the results become more and more outrageous.
Its like the old game of telephone with illustrations, hence the name.

From the publisher:
"The Telestrations Family Pack is perfect for families or small groups of friends. Make hilarious memories with the ones you love or start all new friendships with the perfect ice-breaker game."

"Includes: 6 Erasable Color Coiled Sketch Books, 6 Dry Erase Markers, Over 800 total words & phrases to sketch & guess, 3 Clean up cloths, 1 Die"

216799.name: Sails of Glory Ship Pack: San Juan Nepomuceno 1766 / San Francisco de Asis 1767
216799.description:
Description from the publisher:

The San Juan Nepomuceno was a Spanish ship of the line built in 1765 in Guarnizo in Cantabria, on design of Francisco Gautier, along with other similar ships. She was used for many years for many different missions, many of them in the Caribbean. In 1793 she fought against Revolutionary France, especially in the occupation of Toulon. In the Battle of Trafalgar, she achieved glory under commander Don Cosme Damian Churruca and provided an incredible example of Spanish heroism, fighting British ships after the loss of over 400 officers and crewmen. Ultimately, she was captured and renamed by the Royal Navy.

This ship pack can also be used to represent the Spanish Nepomuceno class “San Francisco de Asis 1767.”

Ship pack contains a new ship with base, ship card, ship log, and specific deck of maneuver cards.

216800.name: Sails of Glory Ship Pack: San Augustin 1768 / Bahama 1783
216800.description:
Description from the publisher:

The San Agustín was a 74–gun ship of the line built at the royal shipyard in Guarnizo (Santander) in 1768 by Francisco Gautier. After fighting during the American War of Independence and in the Battle of Cape St. Vincent (1780), she took part of the Napoleonic wars, where she fought at the Battle of Algeciras in 1801 and the Battle of Trafalgar in 1805. In Trafalgar, under the command of Felipe Jado and Cagigal with 711 men aboard, she was surrounded by several ships of Nelson’s squadron. They fought for hours, but after the third approach, she was after being dismasted and with 180 dead and 200 wounded, the British offered terms to surrender. The ship was burned on October 29.

This ship pack can also be used to represent the Spanish 74-gun ship-of-the-line class “Bahama 1780.”

Ship pack contains a new ship with base, ship card, ship log, and specific deck of maneuver cards.

216801.name: Sails of Glory Ship Pack: HMS Bahama 1805 / HMS San Juan 1805
216801.description:
Description from the publisher:

The Bahama was a Spanish ship of the line, built in Havana in 1780. Originally designed as 64–gun by Ignacio Mullan, she left Havana for Cadiz on 1785. Here she was rebuilt and completed as a 74–gun, following the project of Francisco Gautier, the designer of Nepomuceno class. As a 74–gun ship of the line, she was armed with 74 cannons and a designed crew of 640. They were armed with 28 32–Pounder guns in the lower deck, 30 18–Pounder guns in the upperdeck, 8 32–Pounder guns and 6 12–Pounder guns in the quarterdeck, and 2 12–Pounder guns in the forecastle.

The ship was part of the Spanish fleet that participated in the Battle of Trafalgar, where she was hit by the intense fire of British ships, with 75 killed and 65 wounded. Her commander, Commodore Galiano, died after being struck by a cannonball. After capture by the British fleet, Bahama became HMS Bahama, following repairs in Gibraltar. She sailed to England and was used as a prison ship.

This ship pack can also be used to represent the Spanish Nepomuceno class “HMS San Juan 1805.”

Ship pack contains a new ship with base, ship card, ship log, and specific deck of maneuver cards.

216802.name: Sails of Glory Ship Pack: Protee 1772 / Eveille 1772
216802.description:
Description from the publisher:

Protée was built in 1772 and designated as flagship of a convoy directed to India, departing with other ships as escort, transporting troops and ammunition. On 23 February, off Spain, the convoy met Rodney's fleet; Duchilleau, commander in charge, tried to lure the British by continuing on the same bearing, while the convoy escaped, escorted by the other ships. The British fleet chased and captured Protée.

This ship pack can also be used to represent the French Artésien Class ship-of-the-line “Eveillé 1772.”

Ship pack contains a new ship with base, ship card, ship log, and specific deck of maneuver cards.

216803.name: Sails of Glory Ship Pack: HMS Prothee 1780 / HMS Argonaut 1782 Ship Pack
216803.description:
Description from the publisher:

After being captured off the coast of Spain by Lord Robert Manners, the Protée was commissioned in the Royal Navy as the third rate HMS Prothee. She was converted to serve as a prison ship in 1799, and broken up in 1815. Eight of her small cannons were purchased by John Manners, 5th Duke of Rutland and are currently at Belvoir Castle, Leicestershire. The cannons are still fired on special occasions, such as weddings and the Duke's birthday.

This ship pack can also be used to represent the British Caton Class ship-of-the-line “HMS Argonaut 1782.”

Ship pack contains a new ship with base, ship card, ship log, and specific deck of maneuver cards.

216804.name: Super Mario Kart: The Card Game
216804.description:
Description from the back of the box:

Super Mario Kart - The Card Game!

A fast running card game, players cannot reach the goal before items such as bananas and shells jam your kart and prevent victory! Mushrooms and Stars help you get in first place and achieve victory! Two game modes are included with this game! Grand Prix and Battle Mode!

In the Super Mario Kart Card Game, there are two games you can play: Grand Prix and Battle Mode.

In Grand Prix, players use numbered movement cards as well as item cards to navigate through the pack of racers from the back of the line to the front of the line. When players play movement cards, the numbers are compared to determine placement of one's kart in that round. However, players can also use item cards to assist themselves or hurt other players in their quest to win the race!

In Battle Mode, players are equipped with three balloons (like the video game) and players must manage their hand as well as anticipate the moves of other players to try and outmaneuver their attacks while landing their own. The last player with balloons is the winner!

216805.name: Sails of Glory Ship Pack: HMS Leander 1780 / HMS Adamant 1780
216805.description:
Description from the publisher:

HMS Leander, launched at Chatham on 1 July 1780, served on the west coast of Africa, West Indies, and the Halifax station. During the French Revolutionary Wars, HMS Leander participated in the Battle of the Nile and was captured by French, then captured again by Russians and Turks. On 25 April 1805 cannon fire from Leander killed an American seaman with the resulting “Leander Affair” that contributed to the worsening of relations between the USA and Great Britain. In 1813 Leander was converted to a hospital ship under the name Hygeia.

This ship pack can also be used to represent the British Portland Class “HMS Adamant 1780.”

Ship pack contains a new ship with base, ship card, ship log, and specific deck of maneuver cards.

216806.name: Sails of Glory Ship Pack: HMS Leopard 1790 / HMS Isis 1774
216806.description:
Description from the publisher:

HMS Leopard saw service during the French Revolutionary and Napoleonic Wars, and was active in Europe, East Indies and Egypt. In 1807, a group of British sailors – some of American birth – deserted and joined the crew of USS Chesapeake. Captain Humphreys, commanding Leopard, requested permission to search for the deserters. Chesapeake’s captain refused, and Leopard opened fire, capturing the American ship. Humphreys took back four deserters and hanged the British–born ones. This incident was one of several episodes that increased the tension between the British Empire and the United States, finally exploding in the War of 1812.

This ship pack can also be used to represent the British Portland Class “HMS Leopard 1790.”

Ship pack contains a new ship with base, ship card, ship log, and specific deck of maneuver cards.

216808.description:
Description from the publisher:

Petit Annibal was originally a British ship, the HMS Hannibal, built by Adams of Bucklers Hard and launched on 26 December 1779. She was subsequently captured by the French ship Héros off the coast of Sumatra, in 1782. She was called Petit Annibal to distinguish her from the eponymous 74–gun Annibal, which was in the same fleet. Admiral Bailli de Suffren took her into his fleet, and she saw service in his five battles against British Admiral Sir Edward Hughes in 1782 and 1783. She was decommissioned in 1787 and used as a hulk from 1792.

This ship pack can also be used to represent the French Portland Class “Leander 1798.”

Ship pack contains a new ship with base, ship card, ship log, and specific deck of maneuver cards.
216808.name: Sails of Glory Ship Pack: Petit Annibal 1782 / Leander 1798

216809.name: Historical battles: England 1940
216809.description:
User summary:
Historical battles: England 1940, It is the second installment of this saga, and it is the greatest air battle of the Second World War, unleashed by Germans and British, in this game we can take control of these and fight to win.

The objective of the game is to accumulate 10 victory points, the Germans do it for each bomber that arrives in England and the British gain 2 points for destroying a bomber.

User summary (Spanish):
Batallas históricas: Inglaterra 1940 Es la segunda entrega de esta saga, y se trata de la contienda aerea mas grande de la segunda guerra mundial, desatada por alemanes e Britanicos, en este juego podemos tomar el control de estos y luchar hasta vencer.

El objetivo del juego es acumular 10 puntos de victoria, Los Alemanes lo logran por cada bombardero que llegue a Inglaterra y los ingleses ganan 2 puntos por destruir a un bombardero.

216810.name: Sails of Glory Ship Pack: Real Carlos 1787 / Conde de Regla 1786
216810.description:
Description from the publisher:

Real Carlos was a 112–gun three–decker ship of the line, built following plans by Romero Landa for Santa Ana. She served in the Spanish Navy during the French Revolutionary Wars, but was destroyed during the Second Battle of Algeciras, with the loss of many of its crew. After participating in the capture of San Pietro Island for Spain and Sant'Antioco for France, in July 1801, she was in Algericas battling against the British fleet. The HMS Superb, cutting through the rearguard, maneuvered between Real Carlos and San Hermenegildo. When the Spanish ships opened fire, they struck each other and then collided, with fire spreading out of control. Both exploded and more than 1700 men were killed in the blast.

This ship pack can also be used to represent the Spanish Meregildos class “Conde de Regla 1786.”

Ship pack contains a new ship with base, ship card, ship log, and specific deck of maneuver cards.

216811.name: Sails of Glory Ship Pack: Principe de Asturias 1794 / San Hermenegildo 1789
216811.description:
Description from the publisher:

The Príncipe de Asturias was another of the Spanish three–deck 112–gun ship of the line, based on the Santa Ana design by Romero Landa. She fought with a British squadron on 14 February 1797 in the Battle of Cape St Vincent, with 10 killed and 19 wounded. At Trafalgar, the ship suffered 50 killed and 110 wounded. After the battle, she had to be towed by the French frigate Thémis and undergo major repairs in Cadiz. She returned to fight in the Peninsular War, capturing many French ships. She crossed the Atlantic to Havana with Santa Ana to avoid capture by the French. In 1814 she struck a rock and was scrapped three years later.

This ship pack can also be used to represent the Spanish Meregildos class “San Hermenegildo 1789.”

Ship pack contains a new ship with base, ship card, ship log, and specific deck of maneuver cards.

216812.name: Sails of Glory Ship Pack: Artesien 1765 / Roland 1771
216812.description:
Description from the publisher:

The Artésien was built in 1765 as part of a series of 12 ships of the line built to compensate losses endured by the French Royal Navy during the Seven Years' War. The Artésien took part in the American Revolutionary War, departing in 1781. A fine 1/28th scale model of the ship was used to instruct Louis XVI in naval studies and is now on display at the Musée de la Marine.

This ship pack can also be used to represent the French Artésien Class ship-of-the-line “Roland 1771.”

Ship pack contains a new ship with base, ship card, ship log, and specific deck of maneuver cards.

216814.name: Ein güldenes Herz
rpgseries: AHL - Living Greyhawk Ahlissa (Adri/Innspa) Regional Adventures
216814.description:
Ein zweiründiges Living Greyhawk Herbergsbad/Adri−Regional−Abenteuer

From the introduction:

Die Elfen des Adri blicken mehr denn je auf die Spuren ihrer Vergangenheit. Doch an dieser zeigt sich auch eine andere Gestalt interessiert, die den Elfen nicht wohl gesonnen ist. Zur Erlangung ihrer Ziele benötigen die Elfen daher Hilfe - ein Aufruf an alle Mitglieder der Vereinigung des Falken und die, die guten Herzens sind. (Das Abenteuer ist in erster Linie für gut-gesinnte Charaktere geschrieben und mindestens ein gut-gesinnter Charakter ist notwendig, um das Abenteuer zu
spielen.)

Ein zweiründiges Herbergsbad /Adri Regional Abenteuer mit einer optionalen Begegnung für Charaktere der Stufen 3-15 (Durchschnittliche Gruppenstufe (DGS) 4-14).

Aufgrund des Umfangs des Abenteuers sollte für dieses eine Spielzeit von 8-10 Stunden eingeplant werden.

216815.name: Mario Golf 64 Board Game
216815.description:
In this board game adaptation of Mario Golf 64 from the Nintendo 64, players play through a full course of golf (18 holes), or the half-course (9 holes). Players assemble large cardboard tiles to make each of the 18 holes as well as assemble the plastic putting green.

Once the hole has been assembled, players in turn take control of a 4 inch tall mechanical Super Mario figure. Players choose the golf club (drivers/irons/putter) they wish to use for each stroke on each hole.

Once the appropriate club has been placed in Super Mario's hands, players pull back a lever to make Super Mario hit the small golf ball down the cardboard course. Players take turns on each hole, choosing their club for each stroke, and hitting their golf ball towards the green. The player with the lowest stroke count at the end of the game is the winner!

216816.name: Into the Light
rpgseries: AHL - Living Greyhawk Ahlissa (Adri/Innspa) Regional Adventures
216816.description:
A Multiround Living Greyhawk Innspa/Adri Interactive Regional Adventure

From the introduction:

Die Untotenplage im Adri breitet sich immer weiter aus und gerät langsam außer Kontrolle. Kein Tag vergeht ohne neue Berichte von Untoten, die immer öfter in der Nähe von Waldsiedlungen gesichtet werden. Besonders um Alfersfurt scharen sich die Untoten und bilden dort anscheinend einen Belagerungsgürtel. Die Bürger Alfersfurts wappnen sich deshalb für eine große Schlacht. Gibt es Kräfte im Adri, die dieser anscheinenden Übermacht Einhalt gebieten können? Werden die besagten Helden des Adri, die im Herbst 595 AZ versprochen hatten den Minotauren Thraxus und Fürst Myrhal ein für alle Mal das Handwerk zu legen auch erscheinen und ihr Versprechen halten?

Ein mehrründiges Interaktiv-Abenteuer für Charaktere der Stufen 8-18 (DGS 10-16).

216817.name: Der siebte Tempel
rpgseries: AHL - Living Greyhawk Ahlissa (Adri/Innspa) Regional Adventures
216817.description:
Ein zweiründiges Living Greyhawk Herbergsbad/Adri−Regional−Abenteuer

From the introduction:

Seit knapp einem Jahr kehren Expeditionen aus dem Adri zurück, die von Ruinen berichten, die einst den inneren Tempelring eines längst untergegangenen Drachenkults bildeten. Insgesamt sechs solcher Ruinen sind gefunden worden. Doch alte Quellen berichten von sieben Tempeln und so rüsten die Boccob-, Heironeous- und die Rao-Kirche gemeinsam mit den Drachenjüngern erneut eine Expedition aus, um diesen Tempel zu finden.

Für Charaktere der Stufen 3-15 (Durchschnittliche Gruppenstufe (DGS) 4-14).

216818.name: Die Grube
rpgseries: AHL - Living Greyhawk Ahlissa (Adri/Innspa) Regional Adventures
216818.description:
Ein einründiges Living Greyhawk Herbergsbad/Adri−Regional−Abenteuer

From the introduction:

Ein Drache öffnet euch in mehr als einem Sinne das Tor zu einem lange vergessenen Ort, an dem ihr alte und neue Geheimnise erforschen könnt – aber nur dann, wenn ihr euch in die klaffenden Grube wagt, die so plötzlich aufgebrochen ist … und wenn ihr euch den Schrecken stellt, die unter den idyllischen Hügeln um Amhang lauern.

Für Charaktere der Stufen 1-15 (Durchschnittliche Gruppenstufe (DGS) 2-14).

216819.name: Quelle des Zorns
rpgseries: AHL - Living Greyhawk Ahlissa (Adri/Innspa) Regional Adventures
216819.description:
Ein einründiges Living Greyhawk Herbergsbad/Adri−Regional−Abenteuer

From the introduction:

Ordnung und Gesetz werden in Herbergsbad immer häufiger mit harten Mitteln durchgesetzt. Rumtreiber, Regimegegner und Aufständische werden verfolgt, um den ehrlichen Steuerzahler und die Besucher zu schützen. Trotzdem gehen immer noch seltsame Dinge in der Stadt vor: Ein Wachtrupp ist spurlos verschwunden. Wenn die Stadtwache bereits Abenteurer anheuert, um das aufzuklären, steckt irgendwo der Wurm im Fürstentum.

Ein regionales Abenteuer in Herbergsbad für Charaktere der Stufe 1 bis 13.

User summary:

The 43-page PDF scenario was accompanied by a 15-page PDF of print-and-play components (maps and player handouts).

216820.name: Schatten über Herbergsbad
rpgseries: AHL - Living Greyhawk Ahlissa (Adri/Innspa) Regional Adventures
216820.description:
Ein einründiges Living Greyhawk Herbergsbad/Adri−Regional−Abenteuer

From the introduction:

Mit harter Hand regiert Prinzessin Karasin die Stadt Herbergsbad – Zucht und Ordnung halten Einzug. Die guten Viertel der Stadt prosperieren, während die Ärmsten immer mehr Repressionen ausgesetzt sind. Zudem gibt es Gerüchte von finsteren Machenschaften und verschwundenen Bürgern – Ist etwas faul im Staate Ahlissa? Ein Abenteuer für 4-6 Spieler, jedoch ungeeignet für Zentauren.

Für Charaktere der Stufen 1-11.

216821.name: Im Gasthof „Zum Roten Eber“
rpgseries: AHL - Living Greyhawk Ahlissa (Adri/Innspa) Regional Adventures
216821.description:
Ein einründiges Living Greyhawk Herbergsbad/Adri−Regional−Abenteuer

From the introduction:

Am westlichen Ufer des Harfe Flusses liegt, am Rande des Städtchens Alfersfurt, die bekannteste Anlaufstelle für Abenteurer der Region: Der Gasthof „Zum Roten Eber”. Der Wirt Ernjulf Ebroer sorgt für komfortable Betten, süffiges Wentabier und herzhafte Mahlzeiten für Wanderer auf der Durchreise im Adri.

Ein zeit- und rollenspielintensives regionales Abenteuer im Adri für Charaktere von Stufe 1 bis 15 (DGS 2-12), das nur an einem einzigen Ort spielt.

216822.name: Von Mittag bis Mitternacht
rpgseries: AHL - Living Greyhawk Ahlissa (Adri/Innspa) Regional Adventures
216822.description:
Ein einründiges Living Greyhawk Herbergsbad/Adri−Regional−Abenteuer

From the introduction:

Für die einen Kurstadt, Zentrum von Kultur und Wohlstand in Ahlissa; für die anderen Sammelpunkt von Laster und Verbrechen. Wo die Grenze zwischen Gut und Böse verläuft, ist in Herbergsbad oft eine Frage des persönlichen Standpunkts. Und der kann sich schnell verändern … von Mittag bis Mitternacht.

Für Charaktere der Stufen 1-11 (Durchschnittliche Gruppenstufe (DGS) 2-8).

216823.name: Drachen unter Herbergsbad
rpgseries: AHL - Living Greyhawk Ahlissa (Adri/Innspa) Regional Adventures
216823.description:
Ein einründiges Living Greyhawk Herbergsbad/Adri−Regional−Abenteuer

From the introduction:

Jemand versucht, den ehrenwerten Händler Olgros zu betrügen – indem er ihn um das Geld für vier Dracheneier prellt! Jetzt möchte Olgros, dass ihr diese Schulden eintreibt. Klingt ja eigentlich ganz einfach – aber warum müsst ihr dazu in die Kanalisation... wieder einmal?

Für Charaktere der Stufen 1-14.

216824.name: Brunnen in Flammen
rpgseries: AHL - Living Greyhawk Ahlissa (Adri/Innspa) Regional Adventures
216824.description:
Ein einründiges Living Greyhawk Herbergsbad/Adri−Regional−Abenteuer

From the introduction:

Die Abenteurer sind auf der Suche nach einem Gegenstand, der in der Vergangenheit in Vergessenheit geraten ist. Ein Relikt, das heute überraschend Geschichte schreiben könnte. Und abhängig davon, was die Abenteurer tun, kann es die Zukunft von Herbergsbad ebenfalls maßgeblich beeinflussen.

Ein Regionalabenteuer in Herbergsbad für Charaktere der Stufen 1-15 (Durchschnittliche Gruppenstufe (DGS) 2-12).

216825.name: Gnomisches Herbsttreiben
rpgseries: AHL - Living Greyhawk Ahlissa (Adri/Innspa) Regional Adventures
216825.description:
Ein Interaktiv für Living Greyhawk

From the introduction:

Die Gnome veranstalten ihr jährliches Herbstfest mit „Großen Spielen“, deren erfolgreiches Bestreiten Allen besondere Anerkennung durch die Gnome einbringen kann.

216826.name: Wahre Liebe
rpgseries: AHL - Living Greyhawk Ahlissa (Adri/Innspa) Regional Adventures
216826.description:
Ein Miniabenteuer für Living Greyhawk

From the introduction:

Hilfe wird benötigt, um eine junge Frau aus den Händen ihrer Entführer zu befreien. Auf der Suche nach ihr gelangen die Charaktere tief in den Adri, wo in einer kleinen elfischen Siedlung noch so manch andere Überraschung auf die Abenteurer wartet.

Für Charaktere der Stufen 1-12.

216827.name: Wahre Liebe & Hilfe für Lynaria
rpgseries: AHL - Living Greyhawk Ahlissa (Adri/Innspa) Regional Adventures
216827.description:
Zwei Interaktivabenteuer für Living Greyhawk

From the introduction:

Hilfe wird benötigt, um eine junge Frau aus den Händen ihrer Entführer zu befreien. Auf der Suche nach ihr gelangen die Charaktere tief in den Adri, wo in einer kleinen elfischen Siedlung noch so manch andere Überraschung auf die Abenteurer wartet.

Für Charaktere der Stufen 1-12.

216828.name: Die gestohlene Statuette
rpgseries: AHL - Living Greyhawk Ahlissa (Adri/Innspa) Regional Adventures
216828.description:
Ein Abenteuer für Living Greyhawk

Sonderausgabe für das FANTASY-SPIELE-FEST 2001

From the introduction:

Ein Einbruch in den Heironeous-Tempel von Herbergsbad bringt die Spielerfiguren auf die Spur verborgener Vorgänge im Wald, und eine uralte Gruppierung von Rittern greift wieder in das Geschehen ein...

Ein Abenteuer für Spielercharaktere im Fürstentum von Herbergsbad nach den Regeln der D&D-Drittauflage. Für Charaktere der Stufen 1-4.

216829.name: The Weather Witch of the Adri
rpgseries: AHL - Living Greyhawk Ahlissa (Adri/Innspa) Regional Adventures
216829.description:
A Three-Round Continuous Living Greyhawk Special Interactive Regional Adventure Set in the Principality of Innspa and the Adri Marchland

From the introduction:

This adventure deals with the actions of a young druid-turned-half-elemental by the name of Oromandia Tempest. Attracted to the Adri by news of the heated-up duel between Immonara and Tansy Treewee, news of which have by now spread, the druidess made her home on Devil's Table, a weird-looking but natural rock formation in the north-east of the vast Adri Forest.

User summary:

For 2nd - 10th level characters.

216830.name: Horrors Never Die: DM's Challenge 1
216830.description:
From the introduction:

A Two-Round Living Greyhawk DM's Challenges High-Level Option Adventure Packet for 16th- to 20th-Level Characters

Living Greyhawk DM's Challenge 1
For the Horrors Never Die Story Arc (2006 - 2007)
...
[With a DM's Challenge adventure packet] you get basic guidelines, a special session tracking, and a basic Adventure Record (AR) for an adventure that you write or modify and run.
...
The Horrors Never Die Story Arc (2006-2007) deals with the awakening of yet another danger to Oerth at the Tomb of Horrors, one of the Flanaess’ most fabled locales.

The arc consists of four adventures, three of which are DM's Challenge adventure packets and one of which is a fully written adventure.

The Horrors Never Die Story Arc (2006-2007) is:


DM's Challenge 1
DM's Challenge 2
Return to the Tomb
DM's Challenge 4

216831.name: Horrors Never Die: DM's Challenge 2
216831.description:
From the introduction:

A Two-Round Living Greyhawk DM's Challenges High-Level Option Adventure Packet for 16th- to 20th-Level Characters

Living Greyhawk DM's Challenge 2
For the Horrors Never Die Story Arc (2006 - 2007)
...
[With a DM's Challenge adventure packet] you get basic guidelines, a special session tracking, and a basic Adventure Record (AR) for an adventure that you write or modify and run.
...
The Horrors Never Die Story Arc (2006-2007) deals with the awakening of yet another danger to Oerth at the Tomb of Horrors, one of the Flanaess’ most fabled locales.

The arc consists of four adventures, three of which are DM's Challenge adventure packets and one of which is a fully written adventure.

The Horrors Never Die Story Arc (2006-2007) is:


DM's Challenge 1
DM's Challenge 2
Return to the Tomb
DM's Challenge 4

216832.name: Horrors Never Die: DM's Challenge 4
216832.description:
From the introduction:

A Two-Round Living Greyhawk DM's Challenges High-Level Option Adventure Packet for 16th- to 20th-Level Characters

Living Greyhawk DM's Challenge 4
For the Horrors Never Die Story Arc (2006 - 2007)
...
[With a DM's Challenge adventure packet] you get basic guidelines, a special session tracking, and a basic Adventure Record (AR) for an adventure that you write or modify and run.
...
The Horrors Never Die Story Arc (2006-2007) deals with the awakening of yet another danger to Oerth at the Tomb of Horrors, one of the Flanaess’ most fabled locales.

The arc consists of four adventures, three of which are DM's Challenge adventure packets and one of which is a fully written adventure.

The Horrors Never Die Story Arc (2006-2007) is:


DM's Challenge 1
DM's Challenge 2
Return to the Tomb
DM's Challenge 4

216833.name: Horrors Never Die: Return to the Tomb
216833.description:
From the introduction:

A Two-Round Living Greyhawk DM's Challenges High-Level Option Adventure Packet for 16th- to 20th-Level Characters

Living Greyhawk Return to the Tomb
For the Horrors Never Die Story Arc (2006 - 2007)
...
The Horrors Never Die Story Arc (2006-2007) deals with the awakening of yet another danger to Oerth at the Tomb of Horrors, one of the Flanaess’ most fabled locales.

The arc consists of four adventures, three of which are DM's Challenge adventure packets and one of which is a fully written adventure.

The Horrors Never Die Story Arc (2006-2007) is:


DM's Challenge 1
DM's Challenge 2
Return to the Tomb
DM's Challenge 4

216834.name: Wail of the Banshee Queen: DM's Challenge 1
216834.description:
From the introduction:

A Two-Round Living Greyhawk DM's Challenges High-Level Option Adventure Packet for 16th- to 20th-Level Characters

Living Greyhawk DM's Challenge 1
For the Wail of the Banshee Queen Story Arc (2007 - 2008)
...
A demon lord needs your assistance. What could he tell you that would make you want to offer your help? The balance of power on the Outer Planes may be in your hands.

DM’s Challenge 1 is Part One in the four part Wail of the Banshee Queen Story Arc (2007-2008).

216835.name: Wail of the Banshee Queen: DM's Challenge 2
216835.description:
From the introduction:

A Two-Round Living Greyhawk DM's Challenges High-Level Option Adventure Packet for 16th- to 20th-Level Characters

Living Greyhawk DM's Challenge 2
For the Wail of the Banshee Queen Story Arc (2007 - 2008)
...
A demon lord needs your assistance. What could he tell you that would make you want to offer your help? The balance of power on the Outer Planes may be in your hands.

DM’s Challenge 1 is Part One in the four part Wail of the Banshee Queen Story Arc (2007-2008).

216836.name: Wail of the Banshee Queen: DM's Challenge 3
216836.description:
From the introduction:

A Two-Round Living Greyhawk DM's Challenges High-Level Option Adventure Packet for 16th- to 20th-Level Characters

Living Greyhawk DM's Challenge 3
For the Wail of the Banshee Queen Story Arc (2007 - 2008)
...
A demon lord needs your assistance. What could he tell you that would make you want to offer your help? The balance of power on the Outer Planes may be in your hands.

DM’s Challenge 1 is Part One in the four part Wail of the Banshee Queen Story Arc (2007-2008).

216837.description:
Quiz: Historia Polski (which means Quiz: History of Poland) is a trivia game about Polish history.

Every turn a player throws a die and moves her pawn the corresponding number of spaces. The space that the player lands on determine the following action which may be:

a general question from a card of a color corresponding to the color of space that the player landed on
a historically important date question
the catapult challenge in which a player will try to shoot the ball into the cup using a catapult




Each good answer and each scored catapult is worth 1 point.
The first player to score 50 or 100 points (depending on what players agreed on) is the winner.
216837.name: Quiz: Historia Polski

216838.name: The Fabula Altisonis Reader
216838.description:
A Paper Companion to the Audio Roleplaying Game

From the introduction:

What you are holding in your hands is the paper companion to an audio roleplaying game.

This work is meant to be a hardcopy reference accompanying the audio program, so just these pages by themselves probably won’t make much sense.

The audio tracks, where appropriate, attempt to reference the correct page number in this reader, but as they were developed simultaneously, under somewhat of a time constraint, it is possible that the audio program and the paper companion don’t always match up, page to page, and track to track. My apologies.

216839.name: Fabula Altisonis
216839.description:
User summary:

This series of fourteen MP3 (audio) files present the core rules of the game as well as providing numerous audio resources for playing this unique and intriguing game. The enumerated files are:


A FA Preface (0:43)
B FA Intro (1:23)
C FA Attributes (0:39)
D FA Stats (0:28)
E FA Narratives (1:39)
F FA Sound FX (1:16)
G FA Music (0:51)
H FA Injuries (0:41)
I FA Equipment (0:48)
J FA Sample Character (3:17)
K FA System (2:38)
L FA Combat (1:11)
M FA Experience (0:32)
N FA Post Script (2:22)

216840.name: Baggage Train
216840.description:
The fate of four empires rests in the hands, and the reins, of the men and women in charge of the Baggage Trains. They race their fleet of wagons against their rivals, striving to reach the battlefield and resupply their armies.

Players draw cards which help them to scout the field ahead or sabotage their rivals, and then calculate their advancement towards the battlefield. Random events affect the players progress, and relics may be gained which will invoke the favour of the gods granting bonus victory points.

However, as a Baggage Train is always on the move, resources are scarce. You can only use what you can carry with you, and the more you carry, the slower your progress will inevitably be.

The player with the most victory points at the end of the game is the winner Points are earned for the cargo carried in your baggage train, as well as for having the most scouts or the most saboteurs. The first player to reach the battlefield is awarded a generous victory point bonus, but this alone will not win you the game.

This is the baggage train, where getting there is half the battle.

216841.name: Rituals and Rites - Optional Spell-Casting Rules
216841.description:
From publisher blurb:

Rituals, a novel idea first introduced in 3.5 offers non spell-casters the ability to wield magic at a more fundamental level at a cost. Paizo's Occult AdventuresTM took those rules and streamlined them and made them viable for the Pathfinder Roleplaying Game. However, they were limited to higher level spell effects and really geared for higher level games. This issue of the Player Paraphernalia series-Our 100th issue milestone!-Offers optional rules that expands rituals for 1st through 3rd level spell effects as well as expanding rules for backlash effects, optional rules regarding witches and shamans and their use of rituals, several new ritual related feats, and a new sorcerer archetype focusing on ritual aspects.

216842.name: Empowering the Kineticist - Juicing up the Burn
216842.description:
From publisher blurb:

Tired of feeling the burn? This promotional issue of the Player Paraphernalia series offers the use of alchemical substances to help you power up your kineticist, presented by Matthew Carroll.

216843.name: Sorcerer/Wizard Spells VI (PRD)
216843.description:
From publisher blurb:

Echelon Reference Series: Sorcerer/Wizard Spells is a simple document that collects the sorcerer/wizard spell list, and all spells in it, for easy use. The spell lists are broken up by level and school, and the spells of each level are grouped together and organized by name.

This is a subset of the entire book, containing only the 6th-level sorcerer/wizard spells.

This is the PRD-Only version, containing information from the PRD.

216844.name: Sorcerer/Wizard Spells VI (3PP)
216844.description:
From publisher blurb:

Echelon Reference Series: Sorcerer/Wizard Spells is a simple document that collects the sorcerer/wizard spell list, and all spells in it, for easy use. The spell lists are broken up by level and school, and the spells of each level are grouped together and organized by name.

This is a subset of the entire book, containing only the 6th-level sorcerer/wizard spells.

This is the 3pp+PRD version, containing information from the PRD and select third-party products.

216845.name: R.I.G.S. Sci Fi Volume 1
216845.description:
From publisher blurb:

The Ennead Games blog has a regular feature on it called R.I.G.S. (Random Item Generation System), in which an item is randomly created each week and the result is published and expanded on.

System generic, these items are designed with a sci-fi or modern setting, although some could, with only a minor amount of tweaking, be used in a horror or fantasy like setting or story.

Inside this volume, you will find...

Biological Glass - A type of glass that can be grown and molded
Corrosive Projector - A motar looking weapon designed to fire corrosive acid projectiles
Generational Crystal - The perfect method of storing lifeforms for long distance space travel
Glarati Organic Interface - A biological way of controlling your technology
Infusion Shower - Cleans and regenerates
Microscopic Drone - A spy drone so small you cant see it unaided
Phasing Grenade - A powerful explosive, capable of going through walls
Programable Hip Flask - A portable way of transporting multiple liquids at once
Singularity Teleporter - Send objects a great distance in an instant
Temporal Communicator - Communicate across time

216846.name: Big Book of Kaiju Volume 3
216846.description:
From publisher blurb:

The “Big Book of Kaiju” is many things. It’s a collection of giant monsters culled from the annuls of movie history. Any fan of the genre will be able to recognize a favorite monster here. It is also a game master aid for the “Mecha vs. Kaiju” game, powered by Fate Core, offering statblocks for adversaries to throw against players. And finally it is an aid to players of “Mecha vs. Kaiju,” giving them an insiders look at how citizens of Japan and the world view the creatures that daily menace their lives.

If you play other Fate games it is unnecessary to have the Mecha vs Kaiju Core Book to use this supplement. Each kaiju is fully stated out with unique stunts and is usable in any Fate game. However, if you want your players to have a chance of beating any but the weakest version of these monsters, it's best to have a mecha at your side!

“They say the sea is cold, but the sea contains the hottest blood of all.”
Wales Weep Not, D.H.Lawrence

Yet the blood of wales is nothing compared to the diabolical kaiju. When the monster-makers of North Korea had secured their land border they created creatures to defend their shoreline. But their creations are not the only monsters of the sea – it teems with alchemical beasts, watched over by the ancient prophet of the waves, the great sea-turtle Kameyuu!

This supplement contains

4 new sea-based kaiju. Each kaiju is described as if written in the “real” Big Book of Kaiju, with commentary by contributors about their behavior, tactics, and biology. Each entry features detailed stat blocks, complete with rules for all stunts and mutations, at three power levels:
A level for starting Mecha vs Kaiju characters, or those who run MvK without Construction points. This power level is also appropriate for ANY Fate Core game.
A level for Experienced groups who have achieved Major Milestones.
An Endgame kaiju, in its final form, suitable campaign finales or gamemaster tantrums.

New statblocks for Kameyuu, the giant sea turtle, Prophet Beneath the Waves, when it was first encountered as an enemy, when it seemed almost a friend to mankind, and when it returned as an avenger of the despoiled Earth.
New Kaiju Mutations, including supernatural themes, such as "Mind of Body" and "Spiritual Armor".

216847.name: Fallen Dawn
216847.description:
From publisher blurb:

An adventure set in the Lotus Blossom Steppes for characters of 5th level.

The Lotus Blossom Steppes have long been a land of disjointed tribes, squabbling with one another for central rulership. In the past, great rulers laid claim to the Steppes, bringing the tribes under a single banner for a great purpose—be it under the terrible dictatorship of a half-rakshasa khan or an enlightened visionary khan that leads the tribes beyond the borders of the Steppes. Yet there is great power tucked away behind the tribes’ individual banners. All it takes is an individual with enough ambition and enough power to change the destiny of the Lotus Blossom Steppes... and one ambitious man is on the hunt for the fragmented powers of the NewGod war.

Can the PCs put an end to a rising warlord's ambitions, or will the Lotus Blossom Steppes fall again into tribal conflict?

216848.name: Juggernauts:  Panzerkeil vs. ArtKor, Kursk 1943
216848.description:
Description from the designer:
German korps, Russian army level ... generally. 31 German-Axis and 42 Russian units/pieces. Ferdinands, 503th and 505th Tiger Abs/Bns, 10th Panzer (Panther) Brigade. Panzerkeil panzerkorps formation statuses (unless/until they are Disrupted). 4 Russian Artillery Preparation Korps. No Retreat! and Pressed Attack options. 26+mis/42kms per hex. 10 5-day turns enabling Russian counter-offensive. For Panzerkeil formations possible post-DE second attack after tactical advance. Blitzkrieg/Proriv/Penetration movement phases.

For Kursk, quite fast and simple. Good 4-player game if larger map used.

Another of my free print-and-play games on Coatney History ... while it lasts - while *I* last - I am 70 now.

216849.description: This Big Box edition comes with the new 2016 versions of Dominion and Dominion: Intrigue, as well as additional basic cards for 5 and 6 player games.
216849.name: Dominion (Second Edition) Big Box

216850.name: Catchweed
216850.description:
From publisher blurb:

Deadly Gardens is a series of short PDF documents that each feature a brand new plant monster to use in your Pathfinder Roleplaying Game or OGL campaigns. In addition to a new monster, each volume will also feature supplemental material based around the natural wilderness theme.

In this volume:

Catchweed CR 10
New Magic Item: Twigman Fetish
New Terrain Types: Razor Shale, Shifting Dunes
7 New Natural Items: Assassin Vine Bitterberries, Catchweed Thorns, Leucrotta Mandible, Thunderbird Pinion, Viper Vine Essence, Wyvern Adrenal Gland, Xtabay Spores

216851.name: Alarums & Excursions (Issue 495 - Jan 2017)
rpg: Hanging on the Old Barbed Wire

216853.name: Crazy Max VR
216853.description:
Crazy Max VR is a Virtual reality room scale shooting game made exclusively for the HTC Vive. Survive on different playgrounds the stream of “crazy” creatures and the boss monster(s).

Source: The Developer Website.

216854.name: Game Royale 2: The Secret of Jannis Island
216854.description:
